1 J.Kepler，《Harmonices Mundi》，第五卷，第 10 章。

1 J.Kepler, Harmonices Mundi, Book V, ch. 10.



2 同上，《Prooemium》至第五卷。

2 ibid., Prooemium to Book V.



3 Il Saggiatore （Opere，6，第232页），引用自H.Weyl，数学和自然科学哲学，普林斯顿（1949），第112页。

3 Il Saggiatore (Opere, 6, p. 232), quoted by H.Weyl, Philosophy of Mathematics and Natural Science, Princeton (1949), p. 112.



4 Opere，1，佛罗伦萨（1842 年），第 24 页。

4 Opere, 1, Florence (1842), p. 24.



5H.Diels，《Die Fragmente der Vorsokratiker》（第 6 版），柏林（1952 年），2，第 14 页。 97（德谟克利特 A 49）。

5 H.Diels, Die Fragmente der Vorsokratiker (6th edn.), Berlin (1952), 2, p. 97 (Democritus A 49).



6 阿尔伯特·爱因斯坦：哲学家-科学家，埃文斯顿，1949 年，第 53 页。

6 Albert Einstein: Philosopher-Scientist, Evanston, 1949, p. 53.



7 这份声明于1954年初经爱因斯坦批准发表。1953年夏天，在普林斯顿与爱因斯坦共事的N.巴拉兹博士向爱因斯坦介绍了我的问题，并汇报了他的答复。巴拉兹先生在1953年7月8日的一封信中描述了他与爱因斯坦的首次访谈结果，如下：

7 This statement was approved for publication by Einstein early in 1954. Dr. N. Balazs, who was working with Einstein in Princeton in Summer 1953, introduced my questions to him and reported his replies. The result of his first interview with Einstein was described by Mr. Balazs in a letter of July 8th, 1953, as follows:

今天我与爱因斯坦讨论了狭义相对论的基本思想。

Today I discussed with Einstein the basic ideas which have led to the foundation of the special theory of relativity.

结果大致如下：

The result is about the following:

有两个基本问题值得深思，它们具有根本性的重要意义。

There were basically two problems whose contemplation was of fundamental importance.

（1）他在自传体小品中提到的关于以光速运动的观察者观察光波的印象的问题；

(1) The problem he is referring to in his autobiographical sketch about the impressions of an observer moving with the velocity of light and viewing a lightwave;

（2）φ电流元件和φ磁体之间作用的对称性不足。（在前相对论运动介质电动力学中，是让带电流的导线相对于磁体移动，还是让磁体相对于导线移动，会产生很大的不同。）

(2) the lack of symmetry of action between phi current elements and phi magnets. (In the pre-relativistic electrodynamics of moving media it made a lot of difference whether you move a wire with a current relative to a magnet, or the magnet relative to the wire.)

（1）他暗示光速必定扮演着至关重要的角色；（2）这听起来很奇怪，因为除其他原因外，他认为这种情况是由相同的相对速度决定的。我希望我没有误解他的意思。

(1) suggested to him that the velocity of light must play a privileged role; (2) seemed strange since, among other reasons, he felt that the situation is to be determined by the relative velocities which are the same. I hope I do not misrepresent him.

迈克尔逊-莫雷实验对爱因斯坦理论的建立毫无贡献。他是在阅读洛伦兹关于该实验理论的论文时了解到这个实验的（当然，他记不清具体时间了，但比洛伦兹的论文更早），但它并没有对爱因斯坦的思考产生进一步的影响，相对论也根本无法解释实验结果。

The Michelson-Morley experiment had no role in the foundation of the theory. He got acquainted with it while reading Lorentz’s paper about the theory of this experiment (he of course does not remember exactly when, though prior to his papers), but it had no further influence on Einstein’s considerations and the theory of relativity was not founded to explain its outcome at all.’



8 阿尔伯特·爱因斯坦，“Zur Elektrodynamik bewegter Körper”；物理学年鉴(4), 17

8 Albert Einstein, ‘Zur Elektrodynamik bewegter Körper’; Annalen der Physik (4), 17

(1905)，第 891 页。

(1905), p. 891.



9 E.Mach，《Die Mechanik in ihrer Entwicklung》，第 2 版，莱比锡 (1889)，第 213-14 页。

9 E.Mach, Die Mechanik in ihrer Entwicklung, 2nd edn., Leipzig (1889), pp. 213–14.



10 阿尔伯特·爱因斯坦：哲学家-科学家，第 21 页。

10 Albert Einstein: Philosopher-Scientist, p. 21.



11 WMHicks，Phil. Mag.，第 6 辑，3 （1902 年），第 9-42 页。

11 W.M.Hicks, Phil. Mag., 6th ser., 3 (1902), pp. 9–42.



12 1938 年，CGDarwin 在剑桥英国物理学会 A 分会的主席致辞中这样评价 DCMiller 的实验：“我们看不出有任何理由认为这项工作会不如迈克尔逊的，因为他不仅掌握了迈克尔逊工作的所有经验，而且还掌握了其间技术的巨大发展，但事实上他未能证实以太漂移的准确消失。发生了什么？没有人怀疑相对论。因此，一定有什么未知的误差源扰乱了米勒的工作。”——从我自己的经验中我可以看出，这确实是那个时期当代物理学家的态度。只有出于意识形态原因反对相对论的苏联物理学家认为米勒的实验对这个理论产生了怀疑。我要感谢当时苏联物理学教授 T.Ehrenfest 夫人提供的信息。

12 In his Presidential Address to Section A of the British Association, Cambridge, 1938, C.G.Darwin says of D.C.Miller’s experiments: ‘We cannot see any reason to think that this work would be inferior to Michelson’s, as he had at his disposal not only all the experience of Michelson’s work, but also the very great technical development of the intervening period, but in fact he failed to verify the exact vanishing of the aether drift. What happened? Nobody doubted relativity. There must therefore be some unknown source of error which had upset Miller’s work.’—I can confirm from my own experience that this was the attitude of contemporary physicists all during that period. Only Soviet physicists, who objected to relativity for ideological reasons, felt that Miller’s experiments casted a doubt on the theory. I owe this information to Mme. T.Ehrenfest, who was a professor of physics in Soviet Russia at the time.

JLSynge在《科学学报》（皇家都柏林学会，26，NS，1952年），第45-54页）中明确阐述了正确的立场。狭义相对论的接受基于迈克尔逊和莫雷实验以外的其他依据。其中包括G.Joos在《物理学年鉴》 （1930年），第7卷，第385页；R.J.Kennedy在《自然-科学院院刊》（12）中的观察结果。

The true position was explicitly stated by J.L.Synge, Scientific Proc. Royal Dublin Society, 26, N.S. (1952), pp. 45–54. The special theory is accepted on other grounds than the experiments of Michelson and Morley. Among these are the observations by G.Joos, Ann.d.Physik, 7 (1930), p. 385; R.J.Kennedy, Proc. Nat. Acad. Science, 12

(1926)，第621页；KKIllingworth，《物理评论》30 (1927)，第692页；Michelson、Pease和Pearson，《美国光学学会杂志》18 (1929)，第181页，这些文献都用迈克尔逊干涉仪以外的其他方法证明了以太漂移的不存在。因此，辛格拒绝了D.C.米勒对其实验的解释，而接受了“理论家对迈克尔逊-莫雷实验的描述”，该描述“在任何一本关于相对论的书籍中都能找到”。

(1926), p. 621; K.K.Illingworth, Phys. Rev., 30 (1927), p. 692; Michelson, Pease and Pearson, J.Opt.Soc.Amer., 18 (1929), 181, which have shown the absence of etherdrift by other methods than the Michelson interferometer. Hence Synge rejects the explanation given by D.C.Miller for his experiments and accepts ‘the theorist’s description’ of the Michelson-Morley experiment which ‘is to be found in any book on relativity’.

辛格认为，米勒的结果可以用这样一个事实来解释：干涉仪并非在自转的地球的推动下做匀速直线运动，而是做圆周运动。最近，RSShankland、SWMcCuskey、FCLeone 和 G.Kuerti 在《现代物理学评论》第 27 卷（1955 年）第 167 页中分析了米勒的一些原始数据表，并得出结论：表观以太漂移是由统计涨落和温度效应模拟的。

Synge thinks that Miller’s results are to be explained by the fact that the interferometer is not carried in a uniform straight motion, but in a circle, by the rotating earth. More recently, some of Miller’s original data sheets have been analysed by R.S.Shankland, S.W.McCuskey, F.C.Leone and G.Kuerti in Rev. Modern Phys., 27 (1955), p. 167, who conclude that the apparent ether drift was simulated by statistical fluctuations and temperature effects.



十三 请看以下两句话：“科学哲学家对导致发现的思维过程不太感兴趣……”（H.Reichenbach，《爱因斯坦：哲学家-科学家》，埃文斯顿（1949 年），第 289 页）；或“科学方法的要点是……验证和证明，而不是发现”（H.Mehlberg，《科学与自由》，伦敦（1955 年），第 127 页）。实际上，哲学家广泛使用归纳法作为科学发现的方法；但当他们偶尔意识到这不是发现的方法时，他们会将他们的理论无法适用的事实归结为心理学。

13 Take the following two statements: The philosopher of science is not much interested in the thought processes which lead to discovery…’ (H.Reichenbach in Einstein: Philosopher-Scientist, Evanston (1949), p. 289); or ‘The gist of the scientific method is…verification and proof, not discovery’ (H.Mehlberg in Science and Freedom, London (1955), p. 127). Actually, philosophers deal extensively with induction as a method of scientific discovery; but when they occasionally realize that this is not how discoveries are made, they dispose of the facts to which their theory fails to apply by relegating them to psychology.



14 马克斯·玻恩，《爱因斯坦相对论》，HLBrose 译，伦敦（1924 年），第 289 页。

14 Max Born, Einstein’s Theory of Relativity, translated by H.L.Brose, London (1924), p. 289.



15 H.Weyl，上文，第 155 页。

15 H.Weyl, op. cit., p. 155.



16 马斯基林在 1795 年 7 月 31 日的《格林尼治天文观测》中写道：“我认为有必要指出，我的助手戴维·金布鲁克先生……从去年 8 月初开始，根据我的观察，他把凌日的时间比应该的时间晚了半秒；到了 1796 年 1 月，他把误差扩大到 一秒钟。不幸的是，在我注意到之前，他已经犯了这个错误相当长一段时间，而且在我看来，他似乎永远不可能克服它，回到正确的观测方法，因此，尽管非常不情愿……我还是和他分手了。”（引自 RLDuncombe，《天文学中的个人方程》，《大众天文学》，53 （1945），2-13，63-76，110-21，第3页。）

16 Maskeleyne wrote in the Greenwich Astronomical Observations for July 31st, 1795: ‘I think it necessary to mention that my assistant, Mr. David Kinnebrook…began from the beginning of August last, to set them [the transits] down half a second of time later than he should do, according to my observations; in January of the succeeding year, 1796, he increased his error to of a second. As he had unfortunately continued a considerable time in this error before I noticed it, and did not seem to me likely ever to get over it, and return to a right method of observing, therefore, though with great reluctance… I parted with him.’ (Quoted by R.L.Duncombe, ‘Personal Equation in Astronomy’, Pop. Astron., 53 (1945), 2–13, 63–76, 110–21, p. 3.)



17 我可以引用普林斯顿大学伟大的天文学家HNRussell的话来证实这一点，他指出，每个观测者都会犯“极其棘手的错误”，这些错误会影响现代经纬仪的使用（HNRussell、RSDugan和JQStewart，《CAYoung天文学手册修订版I.太阳系》。波士顿（1945年），第63页）。但我们也可以举一个更通俗的例子，尽管它可能与我的观点略有偏差。在英国，赛马比赛冠军的归属曾经是一项需要高超技巧的活儿，通常委托给赛马俱乐部的管理员，直到终点摄影机的出现，冠军的归属才变得显而易见。然而，几年前，已故的图灵（AMTuring）向我展示了一张终点照片，照片中一匹马的鼻子比另一匹马的鼻子略微向前突出几英寸，但第二匹马的鼻子却因为一丝浓稠的唾液而向前突出了六英寸左右，远远超过了对手。由于规则并未预见到这种情况，因此该事件不得不提交给赛事管理员，并根据他们的个人判断做出裁决。图灵以这个例子证明了即使是最客观的观察方法也极其模糊，这证实了我对此的看法。

17 I could substantiate this by quoting the great Princeton astronomer H.N.Russell on the ‘extremely troublesome errors’ varying from observer to observer, which affect the use of the modern transitmicrometer (H.N.Russell, R.S.Dugan and J.Q.Stewart, Revision of C.A.Young’s Manual of Astronomy I. The Solar System. Boston (1945), p. 63). But we may take instead a more homely illustration, even though it may be slightly off my point. The award of the winner’s place in a horse race in England used to be a highly skilled performance entrusted to the stewards of the Jockey Club, until the advent of the photo-finish camera which seemed to render the decision altogether obvious. However, some years ago the late A.M.Turing showed me the print of a photo finish where one horse’s nose is seen a fraction of an inch ahead of another’s, but the second horse’s nose extends forward by six inches or so well ahead of that of its rival by virtue of the projection of a thick thread of saliva. Since such a situation was not foreseen by the rules, the case had to be referred to the stewards and the award made on the grounds of their personal judgment. Turing gave me this as an example for the ultimate vagueness of even the most objective methods of observation, in confirmation of my views in this matter.



18 请参阅第二部分第 6 章和第二部分第 9 章。

18 See Part Two, ch. 6 and Part Two, ch. 9.



19 RAFisher，《实验设计》，伦敦，1935 年，第三部分（第 30 页及后续页）。

19 R.A.Fisher, The Design of Experiments, London, 1935, Part III (pp. 30 ff.).



20 参见H. Jeffreys，《概率论》，牛津，1939年；I. J. Good，《概率与证据的权衡》，伦敦，1950年。Jeffreys使用P(H/E)，Good P B (H/E) 。凯恩斯在《人本论》中使用了a/h的表达式，其中h代表证据，a代表由此推断出的命题。

20 See H.Jeffreys, Theory of Probability, Oxford, 1939; I.J.Good, Probability and the Weighing of Evidence, London, 1950. Jeffreys uses P(H/E), Good PB(H/E). Keynes in the Treatise used the expression a/h, where h stands for the evidence and a for the proposition inferred from it.



21 LGHumphreys，《随机交替强化对条件性眼睑反应习得和消退的影响》，《实验心理学杂志》，25 （1939），第141-158页。“在类似条件反射的情境中，言语期望的习得和消退”，《实验心理学杂志》，25 （1939），第294-301页。ERHilgard，《学习理论》，纽约，1948年，第373-375页。

21 L.G.Humphreys, The Effect of random alternation of reinforcement on the acquisition and extinction of conditioned eyelid reactions’, J. exp. Psychol., 25 (1939), pp. 141–58. ‘Acquisition and extinction of verbal expectations in a situation analogous to conditioning’, J. exp. Psychol., 25 (1939), pp. 294–301. Reported in E.R.Hilgard, Theories of Learning, New York, 1948, pp. 373–5.



22我在此假设，砍树是有意为之，而非偶然或催眠状态；同样，我也在喝茶，并且喜欢它。砍树和喝茶的机械行为完全可以加上一个断言符号或类似的感叹词，以表明驱使这一行为的热情和欲望。

22 I am assuming here that the hewing is done purposefully and not by accident or in a hypnotic trance and that similarly I am drinking my tea and liking it. The mechanical performances of hewing and drinking could quite well be prefixed by an assertion sign or an equivalent exclamation to signify the zest and appetite impelling the act.



23 当然，“可能”一词可以有两种不同的用法：一种是将其包含在概率陈述中，另一种是代替“我相信……”作为断言符号的读法。这样一来，我们就必须避免使用任何非人称的措辞，例如“很可能……”，如果要表达肯定，它仍然缺少人称前缀，而必须使用“我认为很可能……”这样的词。如果将这样的短语理解为与“我相当确信地相信……”同义，那么它将有效地表达对其后跟的句子或公式的肯定。它不需要加前缀，也不允许加断言符号前缀。

23 It is of course possible to make two different uses of the word ‘probable’, one in the manner which includes it in probability statements and another which would take the place of ‘I believe…’ as a reading of the assertion sign. We would then have to avoid any impersonal wording such as ‘it is probable…’, which would still lack a personal prefix if it is to express an affirmation, and would have to use instead words like ‘I consider it probable…’. Such a phrase, if understood as synonymous with ‘I believe with moderate assurance…’, would effectively express the affirmation of a sentence or formula following by it. It would not need to be prefixed nor allow itself to be prefixed by an assertion sign.



24 参见 WMSmart，《约翰·库奇·亚当斯与海王星的发现》， 《自然》，158 （1946 年），第 648-52 页。

24 See W.M.Smart, ‘John Couch Adams and the Discovery of Neptune’, Nature, 158 (1946), pp. 648–52.



二十五 凯恩斯的有限变异性原则并没有有效地限制这种选择；因为任何明确的假设已经通过使用外延术语预设了这一原则，所以它不能在一个明确的假设和另一个明确的假设之间进行选择。

25 Keynes’ principle of Limited Variability does not effectively restrict this choice; since any explicit hypothesis already presupposes this principle by the use of denotative terms, it cannot operate in the choice between one explicit hypothesis and another.



二十六 本示例原则上基于 RAFisher 的《逆概率》，《剑桥哲学学会会报》，26 （1929–30 年），第 528 页，由曼彻斯特大学的 MS Bartlett 教授提供给作者。

26 This example, based in principle on R.A.Fisher, ‘Inverse Probability’, Cambridge Phil. Soc. Proc., 26 (1929–30), p. 528, was provided to the author by Professor M.S. Bartlett of Manchester University.



二十七 R.Carnap，《概率的逻辑基础》，芝加哥和伦敦，1950 年。

27 R.Carnap, Logical Foundations of Probability, Chicago and London, 1950.



二十八 请参阅下文第 373 页。

28 See p. 373 below.



二十九 1所有偶然事件都恰好发生的概率很小，这种可能性源于人们虚构地赋予事件发生的确切方式以意义。这种谬论的一个重要例子在罗纳德·费舍尔爵士的权威下广为流传（参见他在赫胥黎、哈代和福特合著的《进化论过程》（伦敦，1954年，第91-92页）中的“对自然选择批判的回顾”）。他用这一谬论来捍卫自然选择理论，反驳那些认为进化过程由随机突变引起的概率极小的反对意见。他认为，同样地，任何人传承一千代祖先的可能性也太小，因为一个祖先个体在其后一千代中拥有后代的概率可以证明是无穷小的。然而，对于一个人的第一千代祖先，我们尚无任何独特的了解，因此，关于他是否源自任何特定祖先的概率的问题毫无根据。产生任何特定个体的生殖链中所涉及的偶然性程度，就是祖先千代中任何成员在我们这个时代繁衍后代的概率。而根据罗纳德·费希尔爵士自己的计算，这个概率已经足够了。我以阿伯格莱车站花园里的鹅卵石为例，说明了这里所涉及的原理。人们可能会合理地问鹅卵石偶然排列成一个英文句子的概率有多大，但问它们以特定方式散落的概率有多大则是不合理的；因为当它们随机散落时，它们不会形成图案。自然选择理论声称能够解释某些重要图案的形成，而不是解释特定的原子随机排列的形成。

29 1A small probability of all chance events having happened exactly as they did, arises from fictitiously attributing significance to the precise way in which the events happened. An important instance of this fallacy has gained currency under the authority of Sir Ronald Fisher (see his ‘Retrospect of Criticisms of Natural Selection’ in Huxley, Hardy and Ford, Evolution as a Process, London, 1954, pp. 91–2), who used it in defence of the theory of natural selection against the objection that the probability of the evolutionary process having occurred by random mutations is prohibitively small. He argues that by the same token the chances of any man having descended through a thousand ancestral generations could be rejected as much too improbable, since the probability of one ancestral individual having a descendant in the thousandth succeeding generation can be shown to be infinitesimal. However, nothing distinctive is known about the thousandth ancestor of a man, and the question as to the probability of his having descended from any particular ancestor is therefore without foundation. The degree of chance involved in the chain of procreation, which produced any particular individual, is the probability of any member of the thousandth ancestral generation producing a descendant in our own day. And this probability is—in the light of Sir Ronald Fisher’s own calculations—quite enough. I have illustrated the principles involved here by the example of the pebbles in the station garden at Abergele. One may reasonably ask what the probability was for the pebbles having arranged themselves by chance to form an English sentence, but it is unreasonable to ask what the chances were for them to become scattered in a particular way; for when they are scattered at random they do not form a pattern. The theory of natural selection claims to explain the formation of certain significant patterns and not the formation of a particular random collocation of atoms.



三十本章中使用的显著模式概念排除了平均值的有序分布；将这些随机特征分配给本质上不同的类别的原因将在第 13 章中解释。

30 The conception of a significant pattern used in this chapter excludes the orderly distribution of averages; the reasons for assigning these random features to an essentially different class will be explained in chapter 13.



31在设计实验时，我们必须设法区分无关特征，确保它们随机变化。在农业实验中，可以通过抛硬币来指定实验地点。（RAFisher，《实验设计》，伦敦，1935年，第48页）

31 In designing an experiment we must try to discriminate against irrelevant features by making sure that they vary at random. In agricultural experiments sites may be assigned by the tossing of a coin. (R.A.Fisher, The Design of Experiments, London, 1935, p. 48.)



三十二因此，我们首先得出了替代概率的定义，其次将其与相对频率等同起来。相反，所有试图从相对频率推导替代概率的尝试都被证明在逻辑上站不住脚，因为频率陈述本身就是概率陈述。如果频率可以用明确的术语定义，那么这一反对意见就可以得到解决，但这本身就自相矛盾（参见第四部分，第13章）。有关以下论证的更详细阐述，请参阅我的论文《论偏硬币及相关主题》，载于《物理化学杂志》（1958年）。

32 Thus we arrive first at the definition of alternative probabilities and secondly at an identification of these with relative frequencies. All attempts at deriving, on the contrary, alternative probabilities from relative frequencies have turned out to be logically unsound, for the statements of frequencies are themselves probability statements. This objection would be met if frequencies could be defined in unambiguous terms, but that is self-contradictory (see Part Four, ch. 13). For a more detailed presentation of the following argument see my paper ‘On Biassed Coins and Related Subjects’ in Zs. f. Phys. Chem. (1958).



33请参阅第四部分，第 13 章，第 15 页。

33 See Part Four, ch. 13, p. 15.



三十四实验3表明，偏压效应在较高温度下趋于消失，并且在更剧烈的震动作用下也会相应消失。需要注意的是，使骰子翻倒所需的能量E t应始终大于E，这样即使在较高温度下，kT也能保持在远低于E t 的水平。我们应该这样做；这也应该适用于“更剧烈的震动”的情况。否则，骰子会一直滚动。

34 Experiment 3 shows that the effect of a bias tends to disappear at higher temperatures, and will vanish correspondingly also under the effect of more violent shaking. Note that the energy Et required for causing a die to tumble over should always be large compared with E, so that even at the higher temperatures kT may be kept well below Et. We should have; and this should apply correspondingly also to the conditions of ‘more violent shaking’. Otherwise the die will keep rolling all the time.



三十五热力学的主要范围在于实验 2 中有序原理的操作与实验 3 中举例说明的热运动的抵消随机效应之间的变量组合。但对于我们目前的目的来说，这些组合可以忽略不计。

35 The principal scope of thermodynamics lies in variable combinations between the operations of ordering principles according to Experiment 2 and of the counteracting randomizing effect of thermal motion as exemplified in Experiment 3. But these combinations may be disregarded for our present purpose.



三十六Enc. Brit.，第 11 版；文章“Atom”由 FHNeville 撰写。

36 Enc.Brit., 11th edn.; Article ‘Atom’ by F.H.Neville.



三十七孟德尔于 1866 年观察到，具有替代可遗传性状的个体数量之间存在简单的整数关系，大约半个世纪后，染色体基因结构也证实了这一观察。

37 Mendel’s observation of simple integer relations between the numbers of individuals with alternative inheritable characters (1866) was similarly confirmed by the genic structure of chromosomes about half a century later,



三十八惠特克爵士，《爱丁顿科学哲学原理》，剑桥，1951 年，第 23 页。

38 Sir E.Whittaker, Eddington’s Principle in the Philosophy of Science, Cambridge, 1951, p. 23.



三十九MRCohen 和 E.Nagel，《逻辑与科学方法导论》，伦敦和纽约，1936 年，第 133-9 页。

39 M.R.Cohen and E.Nagel, An Introduction to Logic and Scientific Method, London and New York, 1936, pp. 133–9.



40J.Baron 和 J.Hollo，《生理学杂志》（Zeitschr. fur Sinnesphysiologie），66 （1935），第23页。J.Baron 博士最近准备在《美国声学学会杂志》（Journ. Accoust. Soc., Amer）上发表一篇对此观点的全新阐述。我所看到的手稿提到，OR Ortmann（《钢琴触感与音色的物理基础》（1925））在某种程度上预见了 Baron 和 Hollo 的结论。

40 J.Baron and J.Hollo, Zeitschr. fur Sinnesphysiologie, 66 (1935), p. 23. A renewed presentation of this view has been recently prepared for publication in Journ. Accoust. Soc., Amer, by Dr. J.Baron. The manuscript, which I have seen, mentions that O.R. Ortmann (Physical Basis of Piano Touch and Tone, 1925) has to some extent anticipated the conclusions of Baron and Hollo.



41哈雷·威廉姆斯，《医生不同》（Doctors Differ），伦敦，1946年，第51-60页。推翻艾略特森主张并使其饱受嘲笑和怀疑的实验，是由《柳叶刀》杂志创始人托马斯·瓦克利进行的。这些实验实际上是催眠暗示的惊人演示。

41 Harley Williams, Doctors Differ, London, 1946, pp. 51–60. The tests which destroyed Eiliotson’s claims and exposed him to ridicule and suspicion were conducted by Thomas Wakley, founder of the Lancet. The experiments were in fact a striking demonstration of hypnotic suggestion.



四十二 同上，第 76 页。

42 ibid., p. 76.



43劳伦斯·鲍尔斯 (W.Lawrence Balls) 撰写的《工业研究的性质、范围和困难，特别是关于棉花工业的研究》，于 1920 年 6 月 9 日至 11 日在苏黎世举行的第十届国际棉花大会上发表。

43 ‘The Nature, Scope and Difficulties of Industrial Research with particular reference to the Cotton Industry’, by W.Lawrence Balls, presented to the Tenth International Cotton Congress at Zurich, June 9th–11th, 1920.



四十四在 1951 年 3 月 13 日写给我的一封信中，托伊博士写道：“毫无疑问，在我们早年，我们最重要的工作是发现工业中使用的技术流程的科学基础，而不是当时试图通过临时方法来改进它们。”

44 In a letter dated March 13th, 1951, Dr. Toy wrote to me: ‘There is no question whatever that in our early years by far our most important work was to discover the scientific bases of the technical processes used in the industry, and not at that time attempt to improve on them by ad hoc methods.’



45亚瑟·古德哈特（Arthur Goodhart）在其著作《法理学与普通法论文集》（剑桥，1931年）第25页中写道：“案件的原则并非体现在意见书中给出的理由中。该原则并非体现在意见书中阐明的法治中。” TBSmith在其著作《苏格兰法律中的司法先例原则》（爱丁堡，1952年）中指出，这一原则在苏格兰并非同样适用。

45 Arthur Goodhart, Essays in Jurisprudence and the Common Law, Cambridge, 1931, p. 25, writes: ‘The principle of a case is not found in the reasons given in the opinion. The principle is not found in the rule of law set forth in the opinion.’ T.B.Smith, in The Doctrines of Judicial Precedent in Scots Law, Edinburgh, 1952, shows that this doctrine does not hold equally in Scotland.



46有关棉花分级过程中鉴赏力和测量分级之间竞争的说明，请参阅 M.Polanyi 的《技能和鉴赏力》，《方法论大会》，都灵，1952 年，第 381-395 页。

46 For an account of the competition between connoisseurship and grading by measurement in the process of cotton-classing see M.Polanyi, ‘Skills and Connoisseurship’, Atti del Congresso di Metodologia, Turin, 1952, pp. 381–95.



四十七比较。例如，亨利·瓦隆 (Henri Wallon)，《De l'acte à la pensée》，巴黎，1942 年，第 14 页。 223.

47 Comp. e.g. Henri Wallon, De l’acte à la pensée, Paris, 1942, p. 223.



四十八我指的是托尔曼 1932 年在纽约出版的《动物和人类的目的性行为》一书中提出的符号格式塔理论。

48 I am referring to Tolman’s Sign-Gestalt Theory in his Purposive Behavior in Animals and Men, New York, 1932.



49W.Russell著《大脑、心智、知觉与科学》，牛津，1951年，第35页。关于“人格解体”的其他变体，请参见Henderson和Gillespie编著的《精神病学教科书》，牛津医学出版物，第7版，1951年，第127页。

49 W.Russell Brain, Mind, Perception and Science, Oxford, 1951, p. 35. For other variants of ‘depersonalization’ see e.g. Henderson and Gillespie, A Textbook of Psychiatry, Oxford Medical Publications, 7th Edn., 1951, p. 127.



50科学前提这一主题将在第二部分第 6 章中详细讨论，参见第 6 页（160-171 页）。

50 The subject of the Premisses of Science will be dealt with at length in Part Two, ch. 6, see. 6 (pp. 160–71).



51FJJBuytendijk，“在自由情境中的 Zielgerichtetes Verhalten der Ratten”，Archives Neerlandaises de Physiologie，15 (1930)，第 14 页。 405.

51 F.J.J.Buytendijk, ‘Zielgerichtetes Verhalten der Ratten in einer Freien Situation’, Archives Neerlandaises de Physiologie, 15 (1930), p. 405.



52WN 和 LAKellogg，《猿与孩子》，纽约，1933 年。

52 W.N. and L.A.Kellogg, The Ape and the Child, New York, 1933.



53鉴于黑猩猩达到成熟期的时间较短，儿童的优势比凯洛格及其比较所暗示的要大。但其他观察结果限制了这种优势的范围。例如，现在似乎已经确定，许多动物，其中最显著的是鸟类，可以被教会识别数字。它们可以识别呈现在它们面前的物体的数量，并能重复固定数量的连续动作。它们能识别的数字最大可达8。最有效地证实这一事实的奥托·科勒（Otto Köhler）也发现，如果不给受试者数数的时间，人类受试者无法识别比鸟类更多的物体组的数量。（参见WHThorpe，《Ibis》，93 （1951），第48页，其中引用了O.Köhler在1935-50年间发表的七篇论文。）

53 The superiority of the child is greater than Kellogg and Kellogg’s comparison would suggest in view of the shorter time in which the chimpanzee reaches its maturiy. But other observations restrict the range of this advantage. It seems established now, for example, that many animals, and among them notably birds, can be taught to identify numbers. They can recognize the number of objects presented to them and also reproduce a fixed number of consecutive acts. The numbers identified range up to the number eight. Otto Köhler, who most effectively established this fact, found also that human subjects cannot identify the number of any more numerous group of objects than birds can, provided that the subjects are not allowed time to count them. (Cf. W.H.Thorpe, Ibis, 93 (1951), p. 48, who quotes seven papers by O.Köhler published from 1935–50.)



54本章中，我使用的“articulate”（清晰地表达）和“articulation”（发音）等词语的含义比通常的语言用法更广泛，在通常的语言用法中，这些术语仅指语言声音的实际发音。然而，上下文应该能够清楚地表达我的意思，而且这并非没有先例。例如，参见：ADSheffield，《语法与思维》，纽约和伦敦，1912年，第22页：“从心理学角度来看，简单的断言句表达的是将一个概念整体表达成与引导思路的兴趣相关的元素。”

54 My use of the words ‘articulate’, ‘articulation’, etc., in this chapter is wider than the common linguistic usage, in which these terms refer only to the actual enunciation of the sounds of language. The context, however, should make my meaning clear, and it is not without precedent. See for example: A.D.Sheffield, Grammar and Thinking, New York and London, 1912, p. 22: ‘Psychologically, the simple assertory sentence expresses the articulation of a conceptual whole into such of its elements as are pertinent to the interest guiding the train of thought.’



55在此阶段，我将搁置以下问题：学习是否可以在生理学的扩展框架内得到体现，无论是作为实验条件作用还是作为刺激成熟，因为这不必影响较低和较高表现之间的实际区别，其中前者被认为低于智力水平，而后者则高于智力水平。

55 I shall set aside at this stage the question whether learning may be represented within an extended framework of physiology, cither as experimental conditioning or as stimulated maturation, for this need not affect the practical distinction between lower and higher performances, of which the former are said to fall below and the latter above the intelligent level.



56BFSkinner，《有机体的行为》，纽约，1938 年。

56 B.F.Skinner, The Behavior of Organisms, New York, 1938.



57对条件反射理论的这种批评众所周知。例如，参见DOHebb，《行为的组织》，纽约，1949年，第175页。

57 This criticism of the conditioned reflex theory is well known. See e.g. D.O.Hebb, The Organization of Behavior, New York, 1949, p. 175.



58参见希尔加德，《学习理论》（第二版），纽约，1956年，第106-107页，其中引用了I.克雷切夫斯基（I. Krechevsky，1932年和1933年）关于大鼠“假设”的论述。拉什利（Lashley）早已指出，正常动物绝不会随机行事。（《脑机制与智力》，芝加哥，1929年，第138页）

58 See Hilgard, Theories of Learning (2nd edition), New York, 1956, pp. 106–7, quoting I.Krechevsky (1932 and 1933) on ‘hypotheses’ in rats. Lashley had already said that normal animals never behave in random fashion. (Brain Mechanisms and Intelligence, Chicago, 1929, p. 138.)



59Hilgard，上文引文（1948 年第 1 版），第 333 页，区分了运动学习和感知学习（参见第 2 版，第 466 页）。

59 Hilgard, op. cit. (1st edn., 1948), p. 333, distinguished between motor learning and perceptual learning (cf. 2nd edn., p. 466).



60例如，托尔曼（Tolman）和洪齐克（Honzik）的一项实验就完美地证明了这一点，该实验发表于希尔加德（Hilgard）著作，同上，第二版，第194页（图26）。该实验摘自ECTolman和CHHonzik，《加州大学出版社，心理学》（Univ. Calif. Publ., Psychol, 4, (1940), 215–32。希尔加德提到了一些近期对该实验的批评，但他保留了自己的解释。

60 This was beautifully demonstrated, for example, by an experiment of Tolman and Honzik described in Hilgard, op. cit., 2nd edn., p. 194 (fig. 26), from E.C.Tolman and C.H.Honzik, Univ. Calif. Publ., Psychol, 4, (1940), 215–32. Hilgard mentions some recent criticism of this experiment but maintains his account of it.



61 2 ECTolman，《大鼠和人类的认知地图》，载《心理学论文集》，伯克利和洛杉矶，1951 年，第 261-264 页（摘自《心理学评论》，55 （1948），189-208 页），

61 2 E.C.Tolman, ‘Cognitive maps in rats and men’, in Collected Papers in Psychology, Berkeley and Los Angeles, 1951, pp. 261–4 (from Psych. Rev., 55 (1948), 189–208),



62 W.Kohler，《类人猿的心理》，第二版，伦敦，1927 年，第 123、194 页，

62 W.Kohler, The Mentality of Apes, 2nd edn., London, 1927, pp. 123, 194,



63J.Piaget，《智力心理学》，伦敦，1950 年。

63 J.Piaget, Psychology of Intelligence, London, 1950.



64皮亚杰描述了婴儿通过交替地将物体靠近眼睛或将其移开一臂之遥来探索不同距离物体的不同外观。同上，第130页及后续页。

64 Piaget describes the way babies seem to explore the variable appearances of an object at different distances by alternately approaching it to their eyes or moving it away at arm’s length. Ibid., pp. 130 ff.



65 同上，第 161-2 页。

65 ibid., pp. 161–2.



66 同上，第 62 页；《儿童的判断和推理》，伦敦，1928 年，第 173、176 页，

66 ibid., p. 62; Judgement and Reasoning in the Child, London, 1928, pp. 173, 176,



67语言的这三种形式或功能是语言理论家们普遍认同的。K.布勒（K. Bühler，《语言理论》，耶拿，1934年）区分的“表达、诉求、表达”功能，被D.V.麦格拉纳汉（D.V. McGranahan）在其著作《语言心理学》（《心理学公报》，1936年，第33卷，第178-216页）或布鲁诺·斯内尔（Bruno Snell）在其著作《语言的构造》（汉堡，1952年，第11页）中采用。另见乔治·汉弗莱（George Humphrey）所著《思考》（伦敦，1951年，第11页）。 217. 另一方面，关于这三种功能中是否有哪一种在语言的起源中（无论是在个体还是物种中）占据主导地位以及如何占据主导地位的问题，存在着广泛而尖锐的分歧（例如，参见麦格拉纳汉（McGranahan）的综述，同上，第179页及后续页；或L.H.格雷（L.H.Gray）关于表达理论类型的论述，《语言基础》（Foundations of Language），纽约，1939年，第40页；另见G.雷维斯（G.Révész），《语言的起源和史前史》（Origin and Prehistory of Language），伦敦，1955年）。本论证超出了这场争论的范围，其仅限于表征功能，并非旨在支持例如“表征”理论，而非“表达”理论或“唤起”理论。我在此并非要建构另一种语言起源理论，而是要对语言与其非表述性根源之间的关系进行认识论反思。当然，语言学家的某些理论与我的理论有某些相似之处：例如，萨丕尔对言语在语言中的概念作用的分析（纽约，1921 年）；A.H.加德纳在《言语和语言理论》（伦敦，1932 年）中坚持“所指之物”在言语情境中的重要性；W.J.恩特威斯尔对更为极端的行为主义语言学家的反抗：“机械观点的主要错误在于将人从其言语中剔除，将后者视为独立于人的机器”（《语言方面》，伦敦，1953 年，第 39 页）。但语言学家合理地关注言语本身的语言技巧：而不像我一样，主要关注口头真理的性质，因为其基础无法表达且无法形式化。

67 These three forms or functions of language are a matter for general agreement among linguistic theorists. The functions of ‘Ausdruck, Appel, Darstellung’ distinguished by K.Bühler (Sprachtheorie, Jena, 1934), are adopted, for example, by D.V. McGranahan, in ‘The Psychology of Language’ (Psychological Bulletin, 1936, 33, pp. 178–216); or by Bruno Snell in Der Aufbau der Sprache (Hamburg, 1952), p. 11. Cf. also George Humphrey, Thinking, London, 1951, p. 217. On the other hand, the question whether and how one of the three functions is pre-eminent in the origin of language, whether in the individual or the species, is a matter for extensive and sharp disagreement (see e.g. the survey by McGranahan, loc. cit., pp. 179 f., or of types of expressive theory by L.H.Gray, Foundations of Language, New York, 1939, p. 40, cf. also G.Révész, Origin and Prehistory of Language, London, 1955). The present argument lies outside the range of this controversy, and its restriction to the representative function is not meant to endorse, e.g. a Representative’ as against an ‘Expressive’ or ‘Evocative’ theory. I am engaged here not in constructing still another theory of the origin of language, but in an epistemological reflection on the relation of language to its inarticulate roots. Some of the theories of linguists have of course certain affinities with my own: for example, Sapir’s analysis of the conceptual role of speech in Language (New York, 1921); or A.H.Gardiner’s insistence, in the Theory of Speech and Language (London, 1932), on the importance of the ‘thing-meant’ in the speech situation; or W.J.Entwhistle’s rebellion against the more extremely behaviouristic linguists: ‘The chief error of the mechanical view is to eliminate Man from his own speech, treating the latter as if it were a machine independent of Man (Aspects of Language, London, 1953, p. 39). But the linguists are concerned, reasonably enough, with the verbal techniques of speech itself: not primarily, as I am, with the nature of spoken truth in view of its inarticulate and unformalizable grounds.



68再次强调，本文并非要预先判断“你”在言语初期相对于“自我”的重要性（参见恩特威斯尔，同上，第15-24页），也并非要介入幼儿言语是否以自我为中心或其他方面的争论（参见D.麦卡锡，《语言发展》，载于默奇森著《儿童心理学手册》，伍斯特，马萨诸塞州，1933年，第278-315页）。我在此仅关注语言中无疑存在的一个方面。

68 Again, this is not to prejudge the case for the importance of tu as against ego in the beginnings of speech (see Entwhistle, op. cit., pp. 15–24), nor to enter into the controversy as to how egocentric or otherwise is the speech of small children (see D. McCarthy, ‘Language Development’ in Murchison, Handbook of Child Psychology, Worcester, Mass., 1933, pp. 278–315). I am merely concerned here to deal with one aspect of language which undoubtedly does exist.



69我在这里划出的分界线与心理学家们通常划出的分界线截然不同，他们自维尔茨堡学派以来就对言语化思维与“无言”思维之间的区别感兴趣。我更倾向于像塞缪尔·巴特勒在上文中引用的那样，认为本特利夫人的鼻烟盒就是语言。

69 I am here drawing a dividing line at a rather different place from the one usual among psychologists, who have been interested, back to the Würzburg school, in the distinction between verbalized and ‘wordless’ thought. I should prefer to consider, along with Samuel Butler in the essay already quoted, that Mrs. Bentley’s snuff-box was language.



70参见洛克的《人类理解论》，第三卷，第三章，第二至第四节，其中普遍术语的存在源于一个类似的论证，另参见E.萨丕尔，同上，第11页，

70 Cf. Locke, Essay concerning Human Understanding, Book III, ch. 3, sect. 2–4, where the existence of universal terms is derived from a somewhat similar argument, Cf. also E.Sapir, op. cit., p. 11,



71参见 E.Sapir，上文，第 39 页。

71 Cf. E.Sapir, op. cit., p. 39.



72例如，迈克尔·布鲁斯 (Michael Bruce) 被认为挽救了拉斐特 (Lafayette) 的生命，因为历史学家用“拉斐特 (Lafayette)”取代了较为模糊的拉瓦莱特侯爵 (Marquis de Lavalette) 头衔。

72 As for example when Michael Bruce is reputed to have saved the life of Lafayette, because historians have substituted ‘Lafayette’ for the obscurer title of the Marquis de Lavalette.



73参见斯内尔，同上。引，第。 171，引用 Leumann、Homerische Wörter、巴塞尔、1950 等。另见 S.Ullmann，《语义学原理》，格拉斯哥，1951 年，第 234 页及以下。

73 See Snell, op. cit., p. 171, quoting Leumann, Homerische Wörter, Basel, 1950, etc. Cf. also S.Ullmann, The Principles of Semantics, Glasgow, 1951, pp. 234 ff.



74IARichards（《英语教学中的责任》，《哈佛教育评论》，20 （1950），第37页）指出，一个符号的独特性在于它不会被误认为另一个符号。在拉丁字母表中，o、c、e三个字母的独特性最差，因为它们或多或少是彼此的不完整形式。容易被误认为彼此的还有对称字母，例如pb、qb、un、pq、db；以及数字6和9。文章提到了“看字母的技巧”，对于那些更容易被误认为彼此的字母来说，学习起来会更困难。

74 I.A.Richards (‘Responsibilities in the teaching of English’, Harvard Educational Review, 20 (1950), p. 37), observes that the distinctiveness of a sign consists in its safety from being mistaken for another sign. In the Latin alphabet the three letters o, c, e are least distinctive for they are more or less incomplete forms of each other. Liable to be mistaken for each other are also symmetricals, p b, q b, u n, p q, d b; and among numerals 6 and 9. The article mentions the ‘trick of seeing’ a letter, which is more difficult to learn for letters that can be more easily mistaken for each other,



75副词是否是“真正的”词，或者仅仅是伪词（参见 S. Ullmann，上文，第 58-9 页），这个问题可能仍未得到解决。

75 The question whether adverbs are ‘really’ words, or only pseudo-words (see S. Ullmann, op. cit., pp. 58–9) may be left open here.



76婴儿开始说话时，这种智力就开始发展。参见J. Piaget，《语言与遗传学观点的思考》（Le Language et la Pensée du point du vue génètique），载G. Révész著《思考与说话》（Thinking and Speaking），阿姆斯特丹，1954年，第51页；W. FLeopold，《婴儿语言中的语义学习》（Semantic Learning in Infant Language），《Word》，4 （1948年），第173-180页。

76 It is this intelligence which the infant begins to develop as he begins to speak. See J.Piaget, ‘Le Language et la Pensée du point du vue génètique’, in G.Révész, Thinking and Speaking, Amsterdam, 1954, p. 51; W.F.Leopold, ‘Semantic Learning in Infant Language’, Word, 4 (1948), pp. 173–80.



77NRFMaier，《人类的推理——II》，比较心理学杂志，12 （1931），第 181-94 页。

77 N.R.F.Maier, ‘Reasoning in humans—II’, Journal of Comparative Psychology, 12(1931), pp. 181–94.



78F.Lapiace，概率特征，Ouevres，Acad。科学。编辑，1886 年，第 7页。 2.

78 F.Lapiace, Traité de Probabilité, Ouevres, Acad. Sc. edn., 1886, 7, p. 2.



79参见A.N.怀特海德，《科学与哲学论文集》，伦敦，1948年，第73页：“没有一个句子能够充分地表达其自身的含义。总有一个预设的背景，由于其无限性而难以分析。” 怀特海德继续以“一加一等于二”的例子来说明这一格言。参见下文第三部分，第8章。

79 Cf. A.N.Whitehead, Essays in Science and Philosophy, London, 1948, p. 73: There is not a sentence which adequately states its own meaning. There is always a background of presupposition which defies analysis by reason of its infinitude.’ Whitehead proceeds to illustrate this maxim by the example ‘One and one make two’. See below, Part Three, ch. 8.



80L.维特根斯坦，《逻辑哲学论》，伦敦，1922年，第1889页。稍后我将谈到通过引用更非正式的语言类型来修改对精确性的要求的尝试。PLHeath在《诉诸日常语言》一文中描述了这一方案中遇到的一些困难，该文发表于《哲学季刊》第2卷（1952年），第1-12页。

80 L.Wittgenstein, Tractatus Logico-Philosophicus, London, 1922, p. 1889, I shall have something to say later of the attempts to modify the demand for precision by referring to more informal kinds of language. Some of the difficulties encountered in this programme are described by P.L.Heath in ‘The Appeal to Ordinary Language’, Philosophical Quarterly, 2 (1952), pp. 1–12.



81参阅Ernst Topitsch，《存在主义社会学》，《党派评论》（1954 年），第 296 页。

81 Comp. Ernst Topitsch, ‘The Sociology of Existentialism’, Partisan Review (1954), p. 296.



82在其他不透明物体的集合体中，也存在同样的有效表征困难：例如，晶格中原子排列的表征，或复杂机器中零件排列的表征。晶体学或工程学的学生必须从这些元素的角度进行思考，而这些元素的图形表征必然始终是零散的。关于机器，参见F.Kainz，《结构形式》，载于《Révész 》，同上，第61-110页；第85页，“机械结构”。地质地层测绘任务也面临类似的问题，地质学家们最近一直在为此设计新的、富有想象力的技术。参见L.Dudley Stamp，《地壳中的伦敦》（1951年）；以及关于新开发的“带状技术”，参见WE Nevill，《伦斯特煤田的磨石砂砾和下煤层》，Proc.爱尔兰皇家科学院，58，B1（1956 年），图版 III、IV 和 V；或英国区域调查局，奔宁山脉和邻近高地，科学与工业研究部：地质调查局和博物馆，1954 年。

82 The same difficulty of effective representation arises in respect to other aggregates of opaque objects: e.g. the representation of the arrangement of atoms in a crystal lattice or of the arrangement of parts in a complex machine. Students of crystallography or of engineering have to think in terms of these elements, the pictorial representation of which must always remain fragmentary. On machines, cf. F.Kainz, ‘Vorformen des Denkens’, in Révész, op. cit., pp. 61–110: p. 85, ‘das mechanische Denken’. The task of mapping geological strata presents similar problems, for which geologists have recently been devising new and imaginative techniques. See L.Dudley Stamp, The Earth’s Crusty London, 1951; and for the newly developed ‘ribbon technique’ W.E. Nevill, ‘The Millstone Grit and Lower Coal Measures of the Leinster Coalfield’, Proc. Royal Irish Acad., 58, B1 (1956), plates III, IV, and V; or British Regional Survey, Pennines and Adjacent Uplands, Department of Scientific and Industrial Research: Geological Survey and Museum, 1954.



83我们对“理解”一词的广泛使用使其涵盖了“概念”和“图式”的范畴，后者是克拉帕雷德和皮亚杰用来指代复杂运动能力的术语。我将交替使用这些词，指代一种潜在的知识，或此类知识的某些方面，以区别于任何基于此类知识的外显表现。稍后将引入“直觉”或“洞察力”来描述理解行为，尤其是在数学领域。

83 Our widened use of the word ‘Understanding’ makes it comprise the domain of ‘conception’ as well as that of ‘schema’, the term used by Claparede and Piaget for designating a complex motoric faculty. I shall use these words interchangeably, to stand for a kind of latent knowledge, or aspects of such knowledge, as distinct from any overt performances based on this kind of knowledge. Later on ‘intuition’ or ‘insight’ will be introduced to describe the act of understanding, particularly in mathematics.



84第 58 页。

84 P.58.



85这使人想起索绪尔对“名词”和“意义”的区分（见 Ullmann，上文，第 70-71 页）；但是他坚持认为，他考虑这种关系时，是将其与指称物或所指之物的关系区分开来，这使得他的分析不符合我的论证目的。

85 This is reminiscent of the distinction between ‘nom’ and ‘sens’ by Saussure (see Ullmann, op. cit., pp. 70–1); but his insistence that he is considering this relation apart from the relation to the referent or thing-meant, puts his analysis out of court for the purpose of my argument.



86第 57 页。

86 p. 57.



87实验表明，如果理解了文本，那么学习文本上下文的速度比学习单词的速度更快。J.A.M.Geoch著，《人类学习心理学》，纽约和伦敦，1942年，第166页。牛津大学近期开展了一项实验，一组受试者在听完一段300词的文章后立即凭记忆写出摘要；另一组受试者则在查阅文本的同时，对同一篇文章做了摘要。实验结果发现，记忆中的版本和摘要难以区分。实验者古穆利茨基博士得出结论，这表明“一种无意识的抽象过程似乎与阅读理解文章的过程同时进行”。参见哈里·凯，《实验心理学》，BAFarrell 编，1955年，第14页。

87 Experiments have shown the rather obvious fact that the context of a text is learned faster than its words if the text is understood. J.A.McGeoch, The Psychology of Human Learning, New York and London, 1942, p. 166. In a more recent experiment at Oxford, when one group of people wrote out a summary of a passage of 300 words from memory immediately after hearing it, and a second group made a précis of the same passage while consulting the text, the remembered versions and the précis were found to be indistinguishable. The experimenter, Dr. Gumulicki, concludes that this indicates ‘the operation of an unwittingly abstractive procedure which seems to develop concurrently with the process of understanding the passage as it is being read’. See Harry Kay, in Experimental Psychology, Ed. B.A.Farrell, 1955, p. 14.



88关于这种区别的经典文本是圣奥古斯丁的《论导师》 。

88 The classic text for this distinction is the De Magistro of St. Augustine.



89 作品。引文，“Denken und Sprechen”，第 3 页 ff。

89 op. cit., ‘Denken und Sprechen’, pp. 3 ff.



90不存在第三个领域，我们的注意力会集中在词语或其他符号本身上，以至于我们在说出和操作它们时完全不去关注它们的含义。这种纯粹机械的符号处理，没有任何智能目的的引导，将是徒劳的。即使在使用机器进行计算时，我们也会对结果充满信心地转动它的手柄，并且在这样做时依赖于机器的操作原理。任何无意义的事物都不能被承认为符号，任何无意义的操作都不能被承认为符号操作。从这个意义上讲，形式化必然始终是不完整的。这一点已经被反复预示，稍后将进一步阐述。

90 There is no third domain where our attention is focussed on the words or other symbols in themselves, so that we utter and operate them altogether without attending to their meaning. Such purely mechanical handling of symbols, guided by no intelligent purpose, would be futile. Even when carrying out a computation by a machine, we turn its handle in confidence in the outcome, and in doing so rely on the operational principles of the machine. No meaningless thing can be acknowledged as a symbol and no meaningless manipulation can be acknowledged as a symbolic operation. In this sense formalization must always remain necessarily incomplete. This has already been repeatedly foreshadowed and will be further elaborated later.



91J.Piaget，《儿童的判断和推理》，第 92、93、213、215 页。

91 J.Piaget, Judgment and Reasoning in the Child, pp. 92, 93, 213, 215.



92K.哥德尔，莫纳什。数学。博士论文，38 （1931），173-98。

92 K.Gödel, Monatsh. Math. Phs., 38 (1931), 173–98.



93所有描述的意义中都固有着不可约化的不确定性，以及这种不确定性在将意义与现实关联起来时的起源和功能，这一点在我的著作《科学、信仰与社会》（牛津，1946年）第8-9页中得到​​了肯定和阐述。Waismann的“开放结构”（“可验证性”，PAS Suppl.，19 （1945年））在规范性原则的语境中表达了部分相同的思考，而我认为这是不可接受的（参见下文第113页）。

93 The irreducible indeterminacy inherent in the meaning of all descriptions and the origin and function of this indeterminacy in relating meaning to reality was affirmed and elaborated in my Science, Faith and Society, Oxford, 1946, pp. 8–9. Waismann’s ‘open texture’ (‘Verifability’, PAS Suppl., 19 (1945), stated part of the same reflections within a context of regulative principles which I find unacceptable (see p. 113 below).



94A.H.哈斯托夫，《暗示对刺激大小与感知距离关系的影响》，《心理学杂志》，29 （1950），第195-217页。另见WHittelson和A.Ames，《调节、会聚及其与表观距离的关系》，《心理学杂志》，30 （1950），第43-62页；WHittelson，《知觉中的Ames演示》，普林斯顿大学出版社，1952年。

94 A.H.Hastorf, ‘The Influence of Suggestion on the Relationship between Stimulus Size and Perceived Distance’, J.Psychol., 29 (1950), pp. 195–217. Cf. W.H.Ittelson and A.Ames, ‘Accommodation, Convergence and their Relation to Apparent Distance’, J.Psychol., 30 (1950), pp. 43–62; W.H.Ittelson, The Ames Demonstration in Perception, Princeton, 1952.



95正常的“正视”物体观照方式满足了我们自我设定的视觉、触觉以及本体感受线索之间一致性的标准。​​眼镜会颠倒视网膜图像，使我们看到的物体“颠倒”。但经过几天的适应，眼睛会再次恢复一致性，现在可以通过眼镜正视物体。摘下眼镜后，物体看起来是颠倒的，没有了眼镜。但最终，随着正常视力的恢复，一致性会再次恢复（I.Köhler，《金字塔》，5 （1953），92-5，6（1953），109-13）。

95 The normal way of seeing objects ‘right way up’ satisfies our self-set standards of coherence between visual and tactile, as well as proprioceptive, clues. Spectacles which invert our retinal pictures make us see objects ‘upside down’. But after a few days’ habituation to the spectacles the eye restores coherence once more by seeing things now right way up through the spectacles. On removing the spectacles, objects now appear upside down, without the spectacles, but eventually coherence is restored again by the reestablishment of normal vision (I.Köhler, Die Pyramide, 5 (1953), 92–5, 6 (1953), 109–13).



96对于格式塔理论的类似批评，请参见 D.Katz, Gestaltpsychologie., Basel, 1944;和 M.Scheerer，Die Lehre van der Gestalt，柏林和莱比锡，1931 年，第 14 页。 142.

96 For a similar critique of Gestalt theory see D.Katz, Gestaltpsychologie., Basel, 1944; and M.Scheerer, Die Lehre van der Gestalt, Berlin & Leipzig, 1931, p. 142.



97敏锐的感知力也可以体现在儿童智力的前语言发展阶段。参见上文第74-75页。

97 The vivid alertness of perception could be exhibited also by reference to the prelinguistic development of the child’s intelligence. See pp. 74–5 above.



98G.Ryle，《心灵的概念》，伦敦，1949 年，第 234-40 页。

98 G.Ryle, The Concept of Mind, London, 1949, pp. 234–40.



99AHRiesen，“人类和黑猩猩视觉感知的发展”，《科学》，106 (1947)，第 107-8 页； MvCenden，《Raum und Gestaltauffasung bei operierten Blindgeborenen vor und nach der Operations》，莱比锡，1932 年。

99 A.H.Riesen, ‘The Development of visual perception in man and chimpanzee’, Science, 106 (1947), pp. 107–8; M.v.Cenden, Raum und Gestaltauffasung bei operierten Blindgeborenen vor und nach der Operation, Leipzig, 1932.

100 See Part Two. ch. 6, pp. 197–200 below.

101 K.Vossler, Positivismus und Idealismus in der Sprachwissenschaft, Heidelberg (1904), pp. 25–6. Cf. also I.Murdoch, ‘On Thinking and Language’, PAS. Suppl. vol. 25 (1951), p. 25.

102 G.Humphrey, Thinking, London, 1951, p. 262.



103有关活语言的内容，请参阅 W.Haas（《论说一种语言》，PAS，51 （1951），第 129-166 页）。

103 See W.Haas (‘On Speaking a Language,’ PAS, 51 (1951), pp. 129–66) on living language.



104 J.皮亚杰，《智力心理学》；另见《童年的戏剧、梦和模仿》，伦敦，1951年，第273页。皮亚杰使用的术语是“同化”和“顺应”。我使用“适应”作为后者更易于接受的英语同义词。皮亚杰本人使用“适应”一词的含义更为宽泛，涵盖了这两种过程。

104 J.Piaget, Psychology of Intelligence; cf. also Plays, Dreams and Imitation in Childhood, London, 1951, p. 273. Piaget’s terms are ‘assimilation’ and ‘accommodation’. I am using ‘adaptation’ as a more acceptable English synonym of the latter. Piaget himself uses ‘adaptation’ in a more general sense, covering both types of process.



105J.Piaget，《判断与推理》，第 115 页。

105 J.Piaget, Judgment and Reasoning, p. 115.

D.Thomas，《童年回忆》， 《邂逅》3 （1954），第 3 页。

D.Thomas, ‘Reminiscences of Childhood’, Encounter, 3 (1954), p. 3.



106第一部分，第 4 章，第 51 页。

106 Part One, ch. 4, p. 51.



107下面是科勒在黑猩猩身上观察到的一个例子。这只黑猩猩处于自由状态，手持一根棍子。一根香蕉放在笼子里的地板上；笼子三面都用木板封住；在靠近目标的一侧，水平木板之间有一个缝隙，而在另一侧有垂直的栅栏。这样一来，这只动物只有用棍子将香蕉从木板封住的一侧推向另一侧的栅栏才能拿到香蕉，然后它绕着笼子走一圈就能拿到香蕉。这只动物发现了这个解决办法，并且以前也练习过。它现在正要重复这个动作，并开始在笼子底部将香蕉推离自己；但突然间，一阵噪音打断了她，她似乎忘记了自己的意图，屈服于更原始的冲动，把香蕉拉向自己（这毫无意义，因为木板阻止了她够到香蕉）——然后，在完成了这徒劳的拉扯之后，她绕到笼子的另一边，显然是想像往常一样伸手去拿香蕉，尽管从这里当然够不着。科勒写道：“当奇卡往笼子里窥视，看到目标离栅栏很远时，没有人比她看起来更不知所措了”（同上，第267页）。“用棍子推开香蕉，然后绕着栅栏走”的运动图式在这里与“把香蕉拉向自己”的运动图式混淆了。动物继续进行前一种图式，尽管它进入了第二种图式，取消了它的前提。动物被问题困扰时所表现出的不安将在后面更详细地描述。

107 The following is an example, observed by Kohler in a chimpanzee. The chimpanzee is at liberty and armed with a stick. A banana lies on the floor inside a cage; the cage is boarded on three sides; there is a gap in the horizontal boards on the side to which the objective is nearest, and there are vertical bars on the opposite side. Thus the arrangement is such that the animal can get at the banana only by pushing it away from the boarded-up side by means of its stick towards the bars on the opposite side, where she can reach it by walking round the cage. The animal has discovered this solution and has practised it before. She is now about to repeat it, and has started pushing the banana away from herself across the floor of the cage; but suddenly, interrupted by a noise, she apparently forgets her intention and yields to the more primitive impulse of pulling the banana towards herself (which is useless since the boards prevent her from reaching the prize)—then, having finished this useless pulling, she walks round to the other side of the cage, intending apparently to reach for the banana as usual, though it is of course quite inaccessible from here. ‘Nobody’, writes Köhler, ‘could look more nonplussed than Chica, when she peered into the cage and saw the objective as far as it could be from the bars’ (op. cit., p. 267). The motoric schema ‘pushing banana with stick away, followed by walking round to get it through the bars’ gets mixed up here with the schema ‘hauling banana towards yourself’. The animal goes on operating the first, though its lapse into the second had cancelled its premises. The uneasiness shown by animals puzzled by a problem will be described later more fully.



108参见 M.Cranston，《自由新分析》，伦敦，1953 年，第 163 页。

108 See M.Cranston, Freedom A new Analysis, London, 1953, p. 163.

请参阅上文第一部分第 1 章。

See Part One, ch. 1 above.



109H.Poincaré，《科学与方法》，伦敦，1914 年，第 94 页。

109 H.Poincaré, Science and Method, London, 1914, pp. 94 f.



110例如，参见匹兹堡大学物理系，《原子物理学大纲》，第二版，伦敦，1937年，第313页。庞加莱在《科学与方法》一书中也提出了这一错误。它的谬误通过对晶体双折射和电容器容量的观察而揭示出来。这两者都应该受到洛伦兹-菲茨杰拉德收缩的显著影响，但事实证明并非如此。

110 Cf. e.g. Physics Staff of the University of Pittsburgh, Outline of Atomic Physics, 2nd edn. London, 1937, p. 313. This error too was given currency by Poincaré in Science and Method. Its fallacy was revealed by observations of the bi-refringence of crystals and of the capacity of condensers, both of which should be, but proved not, measurably affected by the Lorentz-Fitzgerald contraction.



111H.Weyl，《数学和自然科学哲学》，普林斯顿，1949 年，第 220 页。

111 H.Weyl, Philosophy of Mathematics and Natural Science, Princeton, 1949, p. 220.

112 Proc. Roy. Soc. (A), 144 (1934), pp. 11–14.



113当然，语言学家们对词义的变化进行了广泛的研究。我从科学中选取的例子应该能够证明，伴随的概念决策与其他科学发现一样重要。这表明，词义的变化通常可能产生真或假的含义。

113 Changes in the meaning of words have of course been extensively studied by linguists. My examples taken from science should demonstrate that the accompanying conceptual decisions rank with other discoveries of science. This suggests that changes of meaning may quite generally have implications which are true or false.



114这是“语境”学派（尤其是Weisgerber和Trier）所强调的意义层面。参见S.Ullmann的总结，上文第75页及155页。

114 This is the aspect of meaning stressed by the ‘context’ school, notably Weisgerber and Trier. See summary by S.Ullmann, op. cit., pp. 75 and 155 ff.



115请参阅 F.Waismann，《可验证性》，载于《逻辑与语言 I》，牛津，1952 年，第 117 页及后续页。

115 See F.Waismann, ‘Verifiability’, in Logic and Language I, Oxford, 1952, pp. 117 ff.



116 同上，另见I.Murdoch，同上。有关“规范原则”及其应用的进一步分析，请参阅第三部分，第10章，第307页。

116 ibid., cf. I.Murdoch, loc. cit. See Part Three, ch. 10, p. 307 for the further analysis of ‘regulative principles’ and their use.



117L.Wittgenstein，《哲学研究》，牛津，1953 年，第 408 页。

117 L.Wittgenstein, Philosophical Investigations, Oxford, 1953, p. 408.



118维特根斯坦对“语言游戏”一词的使用也受到同样的批评。

118 The same criticism applies to Wittgenstein’s use of the term ‘language-game’.



119这种分类过程蕴含着一种经验概括，这种概括在试图形式化归纳推理时通常会被忽视。H. Jeffreys（《概率论的现状》，《英国哲学杂志》，5 （1954-5），第275页及后续页，第282页）指出：“在我看来，这一过程的认识论被过分忽视了。它的应用范围远比拉普拉斯归纳推理广泛，而构建和安排这些问题所涉及的原则，在我看来，是哲学家们可以探讨的。”

119 Such a process of classification implies an empirical generalization of a kind usually disregarded in the attempted formalizations of induction. This is pointed out by H.Jeffreys (‘The Present Position in Probability Theory’, Brit. J.Phil. Sc., 5 (1954–5), pp. 275 ff., 282): ‘It seems to me that the epistemology of this process has been unduly neglected. It is of far wider application than Laplacian induction, and the principles involved in framing and arranging the questions seem to me the sort of thing that philosophers might have something to say about.’



120J.Findlay，《哥德尔句子，一种非数值方法》，Mind，51 （1942），第 259-65、262 页。

120 J.Findlay, ‘Godelian Sentences, a non-numerical approach’, Mind, 51 (1942), pp. 259– 65, 262.



121H.Poincaré，“直觉与数学逻辑”（1900）。转载于《科学价值》，第 1 章。 1，引自 Daval et Guilbaud，Le Raisonnement Mathematique，巴黎，1945 年，第 14 页。 43. 另请参见 K.Koffka，格式塔心理学原理，伦敦，1935 年，第 555-6 页，了解因理解数学证明而引起的转变。数学家的支持性声明参见 Van der Waerden, 'Denken ohne Sprache', in Révész, op.引，第。 165.

121 H.Poincaré, ‘L’intuition et la logique en mathématique’ (1900). Reproduced in La Valeur de la Science, Ch. 1, quoted by Daval et Guilbaud, Le Raisonnement Mathematique, Paris, 1945, p. 43. See also K.Koffka, Principles of Gestalt Psychology, London, 1935, pp. 555–6, for the transformation caused by understanding a mathematical proof. For a supporting statement by a mathematician see Van der Waerden, ‘Denken ohne Sprache’, in Révész, op. cit., p. 165.



122A.Tarski，《逻辑学导论》，纽约，1946 年，第 132 页。

122 A.Tarski, Introduction to Logic, New York, 1946, p. 132.



123A.Tarski，上文，第 134 页。我们在此也许还记得，法律文件和政府法规虽然措辞严谨，力求达到最高的精确度，但却出了名的难以理解。

123 A.Tarski, op. cit., p. 134. We may recall here also that legal documents and government regulations, which are carefully worded to achieve the greatest precision, are notoriously unintelligible.



124格思里和霍顿将一只猫放在笼子里，笼子中央的一根小杆子充当释放装置。那些无意中碰到杆子并因此获得自由的猫，很快就意识到了其中的联系，并开始以完全相同的方式重复它们的释放动作。猫所处的情境并没有给它带来任何可理解的问题，而偶然发现的解决方案也表明它对释放机制没有清晰的理解；智力在整个过程中所起的作用微乎其微（参见希尔加德，同上，第65-68页）。

124 Guthrie and Horton placed a cat in a cage in which a small pole, placed in the middle of the floor, acted as release mechanism. Cats who had touched the pole by accident and found themselves freed in consequence, quickly realized the connection and proceeded to repeat their releasing action in an exactly stereotyped manner. The situation in which the cat was placed offered no intelligible problem to the cat and the solution, found accidentally, showed no clear understanding of the release mechanism; the role played by intelligence in the whole process was negligible (comp. Hilgard, op. cit., pp. 65–8).



125“给参观者留下最深刻印象的（科勒写道）是当苏丹停下来时，他悠闲地挠挠头，除了眼睛和轻微的头部之外什么也没动，仔细地审视着周围的情况”，《类人猿的心理》，伦敦，1927 年，第 200 页。

125 ‘The greatest impression on the visitor (writes Köhler) was made when Sultan made a pause, scratching his head leisurely and not moving anything but his eyes and very slightly his head, scrutinizing the situation around him in the minutest detail’, The Mentality of Apes, London, 1927, p. 200.



126G.Wallas，《思想的艺术》，伦敦，1946 年，第 40 页及后续页。

126 G.Wallas, The Art of Thought, London, 1946, pp. 40 ff.



127当然，“验证”在数学中意味着“论证”，因此更接近于我稍后（第二部分，第 6 章，第 202 页）描述的“确认”，而不是实验科学的“验证”。

127 ‘Verification’ means, of course, in mathematics, ‘demonstration’, and is therefore closer to what I describe later (Part Two, ch. 6, p. 202) as ‘Validation’ rather than to the ‘verification’ of experimental science.



128有一只猿猴一直在寻找工具，以便把笼子外的一串香蕉耙起来，并为此做了各种徒劳的尝试——比如试图掰开木箱盖上的一块木板，或者用一根稻草朝目标方向敲打——显然已经完全放弃了。它继续和一个同伴玩耍了大约10分钟，没有再去看笼子外的香蕉。突然，附近的一声喊叫吸引了它的注意力，它的目光落在了笼顶上的一根棍子上。它立刻扑向棍子，跳了好几次，终于抓住了棍子，并借助它把香蕉耙了起来。我们可以认为，即使在其他事情忙的时候，这只动物也把这个问题“记在心里”，随时准备着在遇到解决问题的工具时立即扑上去。Köhler，同上，第184页。

128 An ape which for a while had been searching for a tool to rake in a bunch of bananas lying outside its cage, and had made various fruitless attempts in this direction—such as trying to break off a board from the lid of a wooden case or hitting out with a stalk of straw in the direction of the prize—had apparently abandoned the task altogether. It went on playing with one of its fellows for about 10 minutes without turning again to the bananas outside the cage. Then suddenly, its attention having been diverted from its game by a shout nearby, its eyes happened to fall on a stick attached to the roof of the cage, and at once it went for the stick and by jumping up a number of times finally secured it and hauled in the bananas by its aid. We may take this to show that even while otherwise occupied the animal kept its problem alive ‘at the back of its mind’, keeping it ready to pounce on the instruments of a solution when they happened to meet its eye. Köhler, op. cit., p. 184.



129库尔特·勒温 (Kurt Lewin) 观察到，我们不会因为太容易或太难的任务而情绪化，只会在我们能够尽最大努力完成的任务中产生情绪。霍普 (Hoppe) 继承勒温的观点，将此称为自我投入的衡量标准。参见希尔加德 (Hilgard)，同上，第 277 页。

129 Kurt Lewin has observed that we do not become emotionally involved either in a task that is too easy or in one that is too difficult, but only in tasks that we can master at our best. Hoppe, following Lewin, calls this the measure of ego-involvement. See Hilgard, op. cit., p. 277.



130RMYerkes，《蚯蚓的智力》，《动物行为杂志》，第2卷（1912年），第332-352页。另见NRFMaier和T.Schneirla合著的《动物心理学原理》，纽约和伦敦，1935年，第98-101页。

130 R.M.Yerkes, ‘The Intelligence of Earthworms’, Journ. Anim. Behav., 2(1912), pp. 332–52. Cf. N.R.F.Maier and T.Schneirla, Principles of Animal Psychology, New York and London, 1935, pp. 98–101.



131当代数学家G.波利亚（G.Polya）在制定启发式准则方面做出了杰出的努力（《如何求解》，普林斯顿，1945年；以及《数学与似真推理》，两卷本，伦敦，1954年），主要目的是为数学教学提供指导。心理学家，尤其是邓克尔和韦特海默，也对问题解决做出了深刻的观察。

131 A distinguished effort to lay down heuristic maxims has been made in our time by the mathematician G.Polya (How to Solve It, Princeton, 1945, and Mathematics and Plausible Reasoning, 2 vols., London, 1954), mainly with a view to giving guidance for the teaching of mathematics. Penetrating observations on problem solving have also been contributed by the psychologists, mainly by Duncker and by Wertheimer.



132AMTuring（《科学新闻》31 （1954））计算出，在系统地解决一种非常常见的拼图游戏（该游戏由滑动的方块组成，需要以特定方式重新排列）的过程中，需要调查的排列数量为20,922,789,888,000。如果日夜不停地工作，每分钟检查一个位置，这个过程将需要400万年。

132 A.M.Turing (Science News, 31 (1954)) has computed the number of arrangements that would have to be surveyed in the process of solving systematically a very common form of puzzle, consisting of sliding squares to be rearranged in a particular way. The number is 20,922,789,888,000. Working continuously day and night and inspecting one position per minute the process would take 4 million years.



133这是为了忽略正式推理过程中所涉及的最小逻辑差距。参见第三部分，第8章，第260页。

133 This is to disregard the minimum logical gap involved in a formal process of inference. See Part Three, ch. 8, p. 260.



134JRBaker，《科学与计划国家》，伦敦，1945 年，第 55 页。

134 J.R.Baker, Science and the Planned State, London, 1945, p. 55.



135波利亚写道：“只有这样的问题，经过一段时间的休息后，才能得到改善，我们热切地渴望解决这些问题，并为之付出了巨大的努力”（《如何解决这个问题》，普林斯顿大学，1945 年，第 172 页）。

135 ‘Only such problems come back improved after a rest whose solution we passionately desire and for which we have worked with great tension’ writes Polya (How to Solve it, Princeton, 1945, p. 172).



136 同上，p. 112、原文斜体。 K.Dunker，《Zur Psychologie des produktiven Denkens》，柏林，1935 年，第 14 页。 13：“…eine Lösung entsteht aus der Beanspruchung des Gegebenen durch das jeweils Geforderte。”

136 ibid., p. 112, italics in the original. K.Duncker, Zur Psychologie des produktiven Denkens, Berlin, 1935, p. 13: ‘…eine Lösung entsteht aus der Beanspruchung des Gegebenen durch das jeweils Geforderte.’



137Polya，同上，各处。

137 Polya, op. cit., passim.



138N.Ach，《决定倾向；意识》，载于D.Rapaport 《思想的组织与病理学》，纽约，1951年，第17页及后续页。

140G.Polya 写道：“当你确信某个定理正确时，你就开始证明它。”（《数学与合理推理》，第 2 卷，第 76 页）

140 G.Polya writes: ‘When you have satisfied yourself that the theorem is true, you start proving it.’ (Mathematics and Plausible Reasoning, Vol. 2, p. 76.)

141 J.Hadamard, An Essay on the Psychology of Invention in the Mathematical Field, Princeton, 1945, p. 49.



142阿基米德在他的《方法》中描述了一种几何论证的机械过程，他对此深信不疑，尽管他认为其结果仍需证明，并随后提供了证明。BLVan der Waerden，《科学觉醒》，格罗宁根，1954年，第215页。

142 Archimedes describes in his ‘Method’ a mechanical process of geometrical demonstra- tion which carried conviction for him, though he regards its results as still requiring proof, which he then proceeded to supply. B.L.Van der Waerden, Science Awakening, Groningen, 1954, p. 215.

143 See Part One, ch. 1, p. 7,

147这颗新恒星的静止状态此前已被观测到，但第谷证实了视差的缺失。（信息来自曼彻斯特大学的Z.Kopal教授）

147 The immobility of the new star had already been observed, but Tycho established the absence of a parallax. (Information due to Prof. Z.Kopal, Manchester Univ.)



148孤立的事实当然缺乏科学意义，正如过去的孤立事件缺乏历史意义一样；但这其实是同义反复，因为事实的孤立性与其对科学家或历史学家的观点产生重要影响在逻辑上是不相容的。我的观点是，独特性并不意味着孤立。

148 Isolated facts are of course devoid of scientific significance, just as an isolated event of the past is devoid of historical significance; but this is a tautology, since the isolated character of a fact is logically incompatible with its having an important bearing on the outlook of the scientist or the historian. My point is that uniqueness does not entail isolation.



149JBConant，《巴斯德和廷德尔对自然发生论的研究》，《哈佛实验科学案例史》，第 7 期，剑桥，1953 年，第 25 页。

149 J.B.Conant, Pasteur’s and Tyndall’s Study of Spontaneous Generation, Harvard Case Histories in Experimental Science, No. 7, Cambridge, 1953, p. 25.



150“其他国家的科学家都不想被认为比巴黎的著名同行落后，”F.Paneth（《科学与奇迹》，杜伦大学期刊，10 （1948-1949），第49页）写道。“……许多公共博物馆都扔掉了他们所拥有的珍贵陨石；德国、丹麦、瑞士、意大利和奥地利都发生过类似的事情。”

150 ‘Scientists in other countries were anxious not to be considered as backward compared with their famous colleagues in Paris’, writes F.Paneth (‘Science and Miracles’, Durham University Journal, 10 (1948–9), p. 49). ‘…many public museums threw away whatever they possessed of these precious meteorites; it happened in Germany, Denmark, Switzerland, Italy and Austria.’



151参见 RBPerry，《价值领域》，马萨诸塞州剑桥，1954 年，第 357 页：“如果像社会学的情况一样，研究主题不允许准确性和结论性，那么对其他主题的准确性和结论性也是不够的。”

151 See R.B.Perry, Realms of Value, Cambridge, Mass., 1954, p. 357: ‘If as in the case of sociology the subject matter does not permit of exactness and conclusiveness then it does not suffice to be exact and conclusive about some other subject matter.’



152拉普拉斯，Traité de Probabilité，Œuvres (Acad. Sc.)，巴黎，1886 年，7 ，第 vi–vii 页。

152 Laplace, Traité de Probabilité, Œuvres (Acad. Sc.), Paris, 1886, 7, pp. vi–vii.



153尽管量子力学改变了拉普拉斯思维运作的术语，但它并没有有效地缩小其范围。世界的时间相关波动方程在所有时间上决定了世界的波动方程，在量子力学中，它代表了我们对世界上所有粒子的终极认知。它确定了世界上所有可能可观测量的统计分布，在这个框架内，只留下严格随机的变化。

153 Though quantum mechanics modifies the terms in which the Laplacean mind operates it docs not effectively reduce its scope. The time-dependent wave-equation of the world determines for all times the wave-equation of the world, which, in quantum mechanics, represents our ultimate knowledge of all the particles in the world. It fixes the statistical distribution of all possible observables throughout the world, leaving open within this framework only variations which are strictly random.



154ANWhitehead，《科学与现代世界》，剑桥，1926 年，第 63 页。

154 A.N.Whitehead, Science and the Modern World, Cambridge, 1926, p. 63.



155请参阅上文第 7 页。

155 See p. 7 above.



156我曾引用过（《自由的逻辑》，1951年芝加哥和伦敦出版，第17页）发表在《自然》（ 1940年，第146期，第620页）上的一组数字，旨在表明不同啮齿动物的妊娠期是π的整数倍。我曾说过，无论多少这样的证据，今天都无法让我们相信这种关系是真实存在的。如今，神秘科学的信徒们经常提出一些科学家不会理会的数字规则。

156 I have quoted previously (in The Logic of Liberty, Chicago and London, 1951, p. 17) a table of figures published in Nature (146 (1940), p. 620) purporting to show that the days of gestation of different rodents is an integer multiple of the number π, and have said that no amount of such evidence would convince us today that this relationship is real. Number rules to which no scientist will pay attention are frequently put forward today by the adherents of occult sciences.



157这是当今的主流观点；这与 D.Bohm于 1951 年在纽约出版的《量子理论》一书的观点相矛盾。

157 This is the predominant view today; it is contradicted by D.Bohm, Quantum Theory, New York, 1951.



158在科学研究管理中，区分无能与错误至关重要。皇家学会给审稿人的以下指示明确了这一点：“不应仅仅因为审稿人不同意论文中的观点或结论就建议拒稿，除非存在明显的谬误推理或实验错误。”

158 The distinction between incompetence and error is of great importance in the administration of scientific research. The following directions to referees of the Royal Society make this plain: ‘A paper should not be recommended for rejection’ (it says) ‘merely because the referee disagrees with the opinions or conclusions it contains, unless fallacious reasoning or experimental error is unmistakably evident.’



159参见G.Abetti著《天文学史》，伦敦，1954年，第73页。ACCrombie著《奥古斯丁致伽利略》，伦敦，1952年，第60-1页，描述了中世纪关于亚里士多德（或物理）天文学和托勒密（或数学）天文学的争论中所使用的类似区别。因此，圣托马斯在《神学大全》第一部分第32题中的陈述为奥西安德的论证提供了背景：“任何事物都可以用双重方式诱导一个系统。一种方法是证明某些原理，就像在自然科学中一样，可以提出充分的理由来表明天体的运动总是匀速的。”反过来，也可以举出一些理由，这些理由虽然不足以证明该原理，但可以表明由此产生的后果与该原理相符，例如在天文学中，假设了偏心圆和本轮系统，因为这个假设可以解释天体运动的可感知现象。但这并不是充分的证明；因为也许另一个假设也能解释它们。'这种盛行于中世纪晚期的约定主义科学理论，其意图是阻止科学接触现实；因此，它的措辞与实证主义的科学分析相吻合，实证主义的科学分析试图通过避免任何对现实的提及，将科学从形而上学中净化出来。因此，正如克龙比 (Crombie) 指出的那样（《伽利略批判后世批判》，巴黎大学，1956 年，第 10 页），迪昂可以说“是贝拉明和奥西安德，而不是伽利略和开普勒，掌握了实验方法的确切意义”。

159 See G.Abetti, History of Astronomy, London, 1954, p. 73. A.C.Crombie, Augustine to Galileo, London, 1952, p. 60–1, describes the use of similar distinctions in the controversies about Aristotelean (or physical) and Ptolemaic (or mathematical) astronomy in the Middle Ages. Thus the statement of St. Thomas, Summa Theologica, Part 1, ques. 32, provides the background for Osiander’s type of argument: ‘For anything a system may be induced in a double fashion. One way is for proving some principle as in natural science where sufficient reason can be brought to show that the motions of the heavens are always of uniform velocity. In the other way, reasons may be adduced which do not sufficiently prove the principle, but which may show that the effects which follow agree with that principle, as in astronomy a system of eccentrics and epicycles is posited because this assumption enables the sensible phenomena of the celestial motions to be accounted for. But this is not a sufficient proof; because possibly another hypothesis might also be able to account for them.’ This conventionalist theory of science, current in the late Middle Ages, was meant to deny science access to reality; consequently its wording coincides with the positivist analysis of science which seeks to purify it from metaphysics by avoiding any reference to reality. So, as Crombie points out (‘Galilée devant les Critiques de la Posterité’, University of Paris, 1956, p. 10), Duhem could say ‘that it was Bellarmin and Osiander, and not Galileo and Kepler, who had grasped the precise significance of the experimental method’.



160G.Abetti，上文，第 74 页。

160 G.Abetti, op. cit., p. 74.



161埃德蒙·惠特克爵士（《爱因斯坦讣告》，英国皇家学会纪念传记，1955年，第48页）指出，与普遍的看法相反，相对论并没有削弱哥白尼学说的物理意义。因为哥白尼的轴是惯性的，而托勒密的轴不是，地球是相对于局部惯性轴旋转的。

161 Sir Edmund Whittaker (‘Obituary Notice on Einstein’, Biogr. Mem. Roy. Soc., 1955, p. 48) points out that, contrary to widespread opinion, the physical significance of Copernicanism is not impaired by relativity. For the Copernican axes are inertial, while the Ptolemaic are not, and the earth rotates with respect to the local inertial axes.



162G.de Santillana，《伽利略的罪行》，芝加哥，1955年，第164页，注：“根据沃林斯基的统计，1543年至1887年间出版了2330部天文学著作……其中只有180部是哥白尼学派的（参见Archivo Storico Italiano，1873年，第12页）。”

162 G.de Santillana, The Crime of Galileo, Chicago, 1955, p. 164 n. ‘On Wolynski’s count, there were 2,330 works published on astronomy between 1543 and 1887…, of those, only 180 were Copernican (see Archivo Storico Italiano, 1873, p. 12).’



163这一叙述基于我对相关事件的回忆，并得到了路易·德布罗意（Louis de Broglie）在其著作《阿尔伯特·爱因斯坦作品中粒子与物质的二元论》（Le Dualisme des Ondes et des Corpuscules dans L'Œuvre de Albert Einstein, Institut de France, Academy des Sciences, 1955, p. 16-17）中实质性的证实。德布罗意补充道，如果没有爱因斯坦后来在1925年发表的论文中提及，他的研究成果很可能会在很长一段时间内不为人知（同上，第18页）。唯一在世的考官查尔斯·莫甘（Charles Mauguin）报告说，虽然他认可考生的独创性和思想深度，但“在论文提出时，我并不相信与物质粒子相关的波的物理现实性。我认为它们纯粹是精神的产物……”只是在做了戴维森 (Davisson) 和杰默 (Germer) (1927 年) 的实验以及 GPThomson (1928 年) 的实验之后，只有当我手里拿着庞特 (Ponte) 在巴黎高等师范学院成功拍摄的精美照片（ZnO 薄层的电子衍射图案）时，我才明白我的态度是多么前后矛盾、荒谬可笑和毫无意义”（《路易·德布罗意和物理学家》，《路易·德布罗意：物理学家和思想家》德文版，汉堡，1955 年，第 192 页）。

163 This account, based on my own recollection of the events in question, has been substantially confirmed by Louis de Broglie, Le Dualisme des Ondes et des Corpuscules dans L’Œuvre de Albert Einstein, Institut de France, Academic des Sciences, 1955, p. 16–17. De Broglie adds that his work would presumably have remained unknown for a long time without Einstein’s subsequent reference to it in a paper published in 1925 (ibid., p. 18). The only surviving examiner, Charles Mauguin, reports that while he recognized the originality and depth of thought of the candidate, ‘when the thesis was presented I did not believe in the physical reality of the waves associated with the particles of matter. I saw in them rather pure creations of the mind…. Only after the experiments of Davisson and Germer (1927), of G.P.Thomson (1928) and only when I held in my hand the beautiful photographs (Electron diffraction patterns from thin layers of ZnO), which Ponte had succeeded in making in the École Normale, did I understand how inconsistent, ridiculous and nonsensical my attitude was’ (Louis de Broglie und die Physiker, German edition of Louis de Broglie: Physicien et Penseur, Hamburg, 1955, p. 192).

W.Elsasser, Die Naturwissenschaften 13 (1925), p. 711. 戴维森和格默最早在1925年观察到电子衍射，但他们将自己的观察结果解释为电子衍射，并发表这一结果，仅仅在两年后的1927年。

W.Elsasser, Die Naturwissenschaften 13 (1925), p. 711. Davisson and Germer’s first observations of electron diffraction go back to 1925 but their interpretation of their observations as electron diffraction and the publication of this result followed only two years later, in 1927.



164伽利略从未运用过这个在他看来最有力的论证。他似乎从未接受过开普勒的椭圆行星轨道理论，大概是因为他的毕达哥拉斯主义比开普勒的更为僵化。（参见G.de Santillana，同上，第106页（注29）和第168-170页）

164 Galileo never made use of this argument, which was the strongest available to him. He seems never to have accepted Kepler’s elliptical planetary paths, presumably because his Pythagoreanism was even more rigid than Kepler’s. (See G.de Santillana, op. cit., pp. 106 (note 29) and 168–70).



165诚然，伽利略发现的金星相位无法用托勒密体系解释，但它与第谷·布拉赫的假设相符，即行星绕太阳旋转，而太阳本身又绕地球旋转。幸运的是，当时没有进行迈克尔逊-莫雷式的实验，因为其负面结果将作为地球静止的决定性证据。

165 Admittedly, the phases of Venus discovered by Galileo could not be accounted for by the Ptolemaic system, but they were compatible with Tycho Brahe’s assumption that the planets circled round the Sun which itself circled round the Earth. Fortunately, no experiment of the Michelson Morley type was carried out at the time, for its negative result would have served as decisive proof that the Earth was at rest.



166参见歌德，Geschichte der Farbenlehre，Vierte Abteilung，2te Zwischenbemerkung：'Vielleicht ist nie einegrosere Forderung an die Menschheit geschehen：denn was ging nicht alles durch diese Anerkennung in Dunst und Rauch auf：ein zweites Paradies，eine Welt der Unschuld， Dichtkunst und Frömmigkeit, das Zeugnis der Sinne, die Überzeugung eines potisch-religiosen Glaubens; kein Wunder, dass man dies alles nicht wollte fahren lassen, class man sich auf alle einer solchen Lehre entgegensetzte, die denjenigen, der sie annahm, zu einer bisher unbekannten, ja ungeahneten Denkfreiheit und Grossheit der Gesinnungen berechtigte和 aufforderte。

166 See Goethe, Geschichte der Farbenlehre, Vierte Abteilung, 2te Zwischenbemerkung: ‘Vielleicht ist nie eine grossere Forderung an die Menschheit geschehen: denn was ging nicht alles durch diese Anerkennung in Dunst und Rauch auf: ein zweites Paradies, eine Welt der Unschuld, Dichtkunst und Frömmigkeit, das Zeugnis der Sinne, die Überzeugung eines poetisch-religiosen Glaubens; kein Wunder, dass man dies alles nicht wollte fahren lassen, class man sich auf alle Weise einer solchen Lehre entgegensetzte, die denjenigen, der sie annahm, zu einer bisher unbekannten, ja ungeahneten Denkfreiheit und Grossheit der Gesinnungen berechtigte und aufforderte.’



167参见RAFisher，《自然法的创造性方面》，爱丁顿纪念讲座，剑桥，1950年，第15页：“我们尽己所能，试图通过推理、实验、再推理来理解世界。在这个过程中，基于道德或情感的理由来选择某个结论是完全不合适的。”

167 See R.A.Fisher, Creative Aspects of Natural Law, Eddington Memorial Lecture, Cambridge, 1950, p. 15: ‘We attempt, so far as our powers allow, to understand the world, by reasoning, by experimentation, and again by reasoning. In this process moral or emotional grounds for preferring one conclusion to another are completely out of place.’



168 1黑格尔，《行星轨道哲学论文》（1801），柏林，1834年，第16卷，第28页。黑格尔在《自然哲学》讲座中承认谷神星和其他小行星存在于这个空隙中。他仍然引用了《蒂迈欧篇》中的数字，但他现在宣称行星距离定律仍然未知，有一天科学家们将不得不求助于哲学家来寻找它。伯特兰·博蒙特在讨论黑格尔的立场时（《心灵》，新斯科舍省，63 ，1954年，第246-248页）指出，柏拉图级数可以扩展到最初的七个之外；但从希腊数学的角度来看，这是不可能的。

168 1 Hegel, Dissertatiophilosophica de OrbitisPlanetarum (1801), Werke, Berlin, 1834, 16, p. 28. In his lectures on the Philosophy of Nature, Hegel admitted the presence of Ceres and other asteroids in this gap. He still referred to the numbers of the Timaeus, but he now declared that the law of the planetary distances was still unknown, and that one day the scientists would have to turn to the philosophers to find it. Bertrand Beaumont, in discussing Hegel’s position (Mind, N.S., 63, 1954, pp. 246–8), suggests that the Platonic series could be extended beyond the original seven; but in terms of Greek mathematics this is impossible.



169HHTurner，《天文发现》，伦敦，1904 年，第 23 页。

169 H.H.Turner, Astronomical Discovery, London, 1904, p. 23.



170CFvon Weizsäcker 于 1943 年尝试通过从行星系统理论中推导出波德定律来对其进行理性解释（Zs. für Astrophysicalk, 22 (1944), p. 319）。但从后来的一篇论文来看，这个问题似乎仍在不断变化（参见 CFvon Weizsàcker, Festschrift der Akademie der Wissenschaften in Göttingen, 1951, p. 120）。

170 An attempt to interpret Bode’s Law rationally by deriving it from a theory of the planetary system was made by C.F.von Weizsäcker in 1943 (Zs. für Astrophysik, 22 (1944), p. 319). But from a later paper it appears that the problem is still in flux (see C.F.von Weizsàcker, Festschrift der Akademie der Wissenschaften in Göttingen, 1951, p. 120).



171 自然哲学在植物学领域持续的时间最长，杰出的科学家对此意见不一。布劳恩和阿加西主要受到歌德形态学和谢林自然哲学的影响。从19世纪中叶开始，其他人开始反对自然哲学，尤其是施莱登和霍夫迈斯特，他们在实验的基础上发展了植物形态学。参见KvGoebel著《威廉·霍夫迈斯特》，伦敦，1926年。我们将在第四部分看到，这场争论至今仍未完全结束。

171 Naturphilosophie lingered on longest in botany, where eminent scientists were ranged on both sides, with Braun and Agassiz standing largely under the influence of Goethe’s morphology and of the nature philosophy of Schelling, opposed from the middle of the nineteenth century onward by others, notably Schleiden and Hofmeister, who developed the science of plant morphology on an experimental basis. See K.v.Goebel, Wilhelm Hofmeister; London, 1926. We shall see in Part Four that this controversy is still not completely closed today.



172AWHKolbe，Journ。 《实用化学》，14（1877），第 14 页。 268.

172 A.W.H.Kolbe, Journ. für praktische Chemie, 14 (1877), p. 268.



173AWHKolbe, 'Zeichen der Zeit II', Journ. fur prakt. Chem., 15 (1877), p. 473. 以上第一篇论文的摘要引自第二篇论文。

173 A.W.H.Kolbe, ‘Zeichen der Zeit II’, Journ. fur prakt. Chem., 15 (1877), p. 473. The above summary of the first paper is quoted from the second paper.



174有关约翰·道尔顿的案例，请参阅 HERoscoe 和 A.Harden 所著《道尔顿原子理论起源的新观点》，伦敦，1896 年，第 50 页。

174 For the case of John Dalton, see H.E.Roscoe and A.Harden, A New View of the Origin of Dalton’s Atomic Theory, London, 1896, p. 50.

176维勒和李比希。年鉴 der Pharmacie，29 (1839)，p。 100.

176 Wöhler and Liebig. Annalen der Pharmacie, 29 (1839), p. 100.



177参见 1865 年出版的皮萨列夫对巴斯德的猛烈抨击。（A.Coquart，Dmitri Pisarev，巴黎，1946 年，第 336 页及后续页）直到最近，苏联还承认列佩辛斯卡娅进行的实验是细胞生物自然发生的证据（参见 Th.Dobzhansky，汉堡科学与自由大会论文集，伦敦，1955 年，第219 页）。

177 See the violent attacks on Pasteur by Pisarev published in 1865. (A.Coquart, Dmitri Pisarev, Paris, 1946, pp. 336 ff.) Experiments acknowledged until recently in the Soviet Union as proofs of the spontaneous generation of cellular organisms were carried out by Lepeshinskaia (see Th. Dobzhansky, Proceedings of Hamburg Congress on Science and Freedom, London, 1955, p. 219).



178RJDubos，上引，第128页。JBConant（《巴斯德和廷德尔对自然发生论的研究》，哈佛大学出版社，1953年）认为（第15页）自然发生论不可能性的最令人信服的证据，可以在“过去六七十年纯细菌培养研究的全部成果中找到”。作者暗示，从1768年Spallanzani开始研究到1880-1890年，所有为解答这个问题而进行的实验，都可以用两种截然相反的思想体系来解释。

178 R.J.Dubos, op. cit., p. 128. J.B.Conant (Pasteur’s and Tyndalls Study of Spontaneous Generation, Harvard Univ. Press, 1953) suggests (p. 15) that the most convincing evidence for the impossibility of spontaneous generation is to be found ‘in the whole fabric of the results of the study of pure bacterial cultures in the last sixty or seventy years’. The author implies that all the experiments made to decide this question, from the inception of Spallanzani’s studies in 1768 up to 1880–90, could be interpreted in terms of either of the opposing systems of thought.



179我之前曾阐明，一个恰当的新概念如何能够调和两种迄今为止彼此激烈对立的解释体系。布雷德的“催眠”概念承认了催眠术中那些迄今为止被用来证明其欺诈性的特征的真实性，同时又驳斥了“动物磁性”的证据，尽管后者曾被提出来作为其科学可靠性的证明。（见上文第二部分，第九章，第108页。）

179 I have illustrated before how an apposite new conception can reconcile two alternative systems of interpretation which hitherto violently opposed each other. Braid’s conception of ‘hypnosis’ acknowledged the reality of the very features of Mesmerism hitherto taken to prove its fraudulence, while rejecting the evidence for ‘animal magnetism’ which had been advanced as its claim to scientific solidity. (Part Two, ch. 9, p. 108 above.)



180爱丁顿推导的“精细结构常数” hc/ 2 πe 2 =137，在G.贝克、H.贝特和W.里兹勒发表于《自然科学》第19卷（1931年）第39页的一篇虚构文章中，也遭到了类似的讽刺。作者们将爱丁顿的论证延伸到了一个荒唐的结论：绝对零度下-273°C的值是一个整数。

180 Eddington’s derivation of the ‘fine structure constant’ hc/2πe2=137 was similarly caricatured by a fictitious communication to Naturwissenschaften, 19 (1931), p. 39, by G.Beck, H.Bethe and W.Riezler. The authors extended Eddington’s argument to the farcical conclusion that the value of—273° C. for the temperature at absolute zero was an integer.



181 《真理报》，1948 年 8 月 10 日，引自西德尼·胡克著《马克思和马克思主义者》，纽约，1955 年，第 235 页。

181 Pravda, August 10th, 1948, quoted by Sidney Hook, Marx and the Marxists, New York, 1955, p. 235.
