3661813 年 de Candolle 在他的Theorie Elémentaire de la Botanique中首次使用了这个表达方式。

366 The expression was first used in 1813 by de Candolle in his Theorie Elémentaire de la Botanique.



367参见 KZLorenz 著《形式方面》，LLWhyte 编，伦敦，1951 年，第 169 页。

367 Cf. K.Z.Lorenz in Aspects of Form, ed. L.L.Whyte, London, 1951, p. 169.



368参阅第 112 页。

368 Cf. p. 112.



369参阅第二部分，第 5 章，第 114-117 页。

369 Cf. Part Two, ch, 5, pp. 114–17.



370这个过程并非统计观察。统计数据只能指特定种群内可测量参数的变化。分类学评判的是分类学家亲自挑选的种群中不可测量的特质组合，并着眼于这些特质的存在。甚至广泛分布的物种也并非被认为是正常的。完全正常的物种——与畸形或残缺的物种不同——可能是最稀有的。

370 This process is not a statistical observation. Statistics can refer only to measurable parameters varying within a given population. Taxonomy judges non-measurable combinations of qualities within a population selected by the taxonomist himself with a view to the presence of these qualities. Nor is it even true that what is widespread is considered normal. Perfectly normal—as distinct from malformed or mutilated— specimens of a species may be the rarest.



371J.拉姆斯博顿在1938年林奈学会主席致辞中指出，尽管林奈直到1751年都严格坚持物种固定性，但他后来提出了一种进化方案。然而，他关于植物自然系统的第一份概述早在1751年就已发表。

371 J.Ramsbottom, Linnaeus and the Conception of Species, Presidential Address to the Linnean Society, 1938, shows that while Linnaeus rigidly adhered to the fixity of species till 1751, he later suggested a kind of evolutionary scheme. His first outline of a natural system of plants was, however, already published in 1751.



372AJWilmott，《从林奈到达尔文》，《分类学发展讲座》，1948-1949 年在林奈学会发表，1950 年伦敦出版，第 35 页。

372 A.J.Wilmott, ‘From Linnaeus to Darwin’, in Lectures on the Development of Taxonomy, delivered in the Linnean Society, 1948–9, published London, 1950, p. 35.



373Mayr、Linsiey 和 Unsinger，《系统动物学的方法和原理》，纽约，1953 年，第 4 页。

373 Mayr, Linsiey and Unsinger, Methods and Principles of Systematic Zoology, New York, 1953, p. 4.



374 同上，第 53 页。

374 ibid., p. 53.



375GNJones，《科学月刊》，72 （1951），第293页。植物种类数量正在迅速增加，这并非源于已知物种的细分，而是源于新发现，尤其是在新大陆热带地区。琼斯认为，我们可能尚未认识现存植物种类的一半。

375 G.N.Jones, Scientific Monthly, 72 (1951), p. 293. The number is increasing rapidly, and not through subdivision of known species but by new discoveries, particularly in the New World tropics. Jones thinks it probable that we have not yet made the acquaintance of half the existing species of plants.



376例如，参见1950年12月系统学会在伦敦举行的关于“植物发生与分类的关系”主题的讨论记录（《自然》，167 （1951），第503页）。一位与会者赞同地指出，这种倾向认为“任何没有动机的分类尝试都是浪费时间”，这是分类学家们这次会议的主要关注点。

376 See for example the account of the discussion held in London in December, 1950, by the Systematic Association on the subject ‘Phytogeny in Relation to Classification’ (Nature, 167 (1951), p. 503). The tendency, approvingly stated by one of the participants, to regard ‘any attempt to make a classification without a motive as a waste of time’ was the main concern of this meeting of taxonomists.



377约瑟夫·胡克爵士，《塔斯马尼亚植物志》导论，伦敦，1859 年，第 iii 页。

377 Sir Joseph Hooker, Introductory Essay to the ‘Flora of Tasmania’, London, 1859, p. iii.



378伦纳德·赫胥黎，《JDHooker 爵士的生平和书信》，伦敦，1918 年，第 412 页。

378 Leonard Huxley, Life and Letters of Sir J.D.Hooker, London, 1918, p. 412.



379CFAPantin，《物种识别》，《科学进步》，42 （1954），第 587 页。

379 C.F.A.Pantin, ‘The Recognition of Species’ in Science Progress, 42 (1954), p. 587.



380正因如此，大英博物馆才收集了1500万只昆虫，以便与任何提交的新标本进行比对。即便如此，博物馆工作人员的成功也需要他们独特的经验。

380 This is why the British Museum has compiled a collection of 15 million insects against which they can match any new specimen submitted to them. Even so it requires the unique experience of the Museum’s staff to carry out this feat successfully.



381ASHitchcock 在《会议记录》中的陈述，剑桥，1931 年，第 228 页。另一位成员，CHOstenfeld 教授说（同上，第 114 页），一个物种由所有个体组成，这些个体的特征在所有主要方面都是相同的，就“我们认为是本质的”特征而言。

381 Statement by A.S.Hitchcock in Report of Proceedings, Cambridge, 1931, p. 228. Another member, Professor C.H.Ostenfeld, said (ibid., p. 114) that a species consisted of all the individuals the character of which is in all main points the same, so far as the characters ‘which we consider essential’ are concerned.



382SCharland，《物种的遗传概念》，《剑桥生物评论》，11 （1936），第83-112页。多年后，我们看到分类学家仍然对这一指控感到尴尬。在《分类学发展讲座》（伦敦，1950年，第81页）中，约翰·斯马特如此描述现代分类学家日益精细的工作：“最终，分类学家所能做的只不过是说一个物种是他决定将其指定为物种的生物体。” 他认为，这“听起来很荒谬”，尽管有证据表明“真正称职的分类学家对此问题有着相当敏锐的见解”。1954年，潘坦（同上）通过在物种定义中引用“称职的分类学家”来为分类学辩护，避免其被视为完全在回避问题。

382 S.C.Harland, ‘The Genetical Conception of the Species’, Cambridge Biol Review, 11 (1936), pp. 83–112. A number of years later we see the taxonomist still embarrassed by this charge. In Lectures on the Development of Taxonomy (London, 1950, p. 81), John Smart describes the increasingly delicate work of the modern taxonomist as follows: ‘ultimately, the systematist could do little more than say that a species was such a segregate of organisms as he decided to designate as a species.’ This, he says, ‘sounds absurd’, even though there is evidence that ‘the really competent systematist had pretty shrewd opinions in the matter’. And in 1954 Pantin (loc. cit.) defends taxonomy against the appearance of thoroughly begging the question by referring to the ‘competent taxonomer’ in the definition of a species.



383John Smart，上文，第 82 页。

383 John Smart, op. cit., p. 82.



384一些生物学家有意识地反对这一运动，并有力地论证了识别生物种类的技巧是他们科学的基础。因此，A. 纳夫（《植物形态的比较解剖学手册》，柏林-维也纳出版社，1921年，第1版，第77-118页）发展了一种纯粹的脊椎动物类型学。阿格尼丝·阿尔伯（《生物评论》，第12卷（1937年），第157-184页）继承了特罗尔（1928年）在德国发起的“回归歌德”运动，并在《植物形态的自然哲学》（剑桥出版社，1950年）中广泛发展了歌德形态学。 J.Kälin ( Ganzheitliche Morphologie und Homologie, Freiburg (Schweiz) and Leipzig, 1941) 强调“形态学的逻辑首要性”，而 O.Schindewolf ( Grundfragen der Paläontologie, Stuttgart, 1950) 则坚持系统学优先于系统发育学。

384 Some biologists, consciously opposing this movement, have argued effectively that the art of recognizing kinds of living things is fundamental to their science. Thus A. Naef (Handbuch der Vergleichenden Anatomie der Wirbeltiere, Bd. 1, Berlin-Wien, 1921, pp. 77–118) has developed a pure typology of vertebrates. Agnes Arber (Biol. Rev., 12 (1937), pp. 157–84) carried on the movement, initiated in Germany by Troll (1928), for ‘returning to Goethe’ and extensively developed Goethean morphology in The Natural Philosophy of Plant Form (Cambridge, 1950). J.Kälin (Ganzheitliche Morphologie und Homologie, Freiburg (Schweiz) and Leipzig, 1941), stresses the ‘logical primacy of morphology’, and O.Schindewolf (Grundfragen der Paläontologie, Stuttgart, 1950) insists on the priority of systematics to phylogeny.



385参见 C.Wardlaw，植物发生和形态发生，伦敦，1952 年，第 99-102 页。

385 See C.Wardlaw, Phytogeny and Morphogenesis, London, 1952, pp. 99–102.



386Konrad Z.Lorenz，《动物行为的生理机制》，《实验生物学学会论文集》，第 4 期，剑桥，1950 年，第 235 页。

386 Konrad Z.Lorenz in Physiological Mechanisms in Animal Behaviour, Symposia of the Society for Experimental Biology, No. 4, Cambridge, 1950, p. 235.



387水螅的二百分之一就能再生出完整的身体，而涡虫的二百八十分之一甚至更少的体细胞已被证实能够完全再生。AENeedham，《再生与伤口愈合》，伦敦，1952年，第114页。

387 1/200th of a hydra is able to regenerate the whole animal, while in the planaria 1/280th and even less has been shown to regenerate completely. A.E.Needham, Regeneration and Wound-Healing, London, 1952, p. 114.



388Driesch 的先驱实验被他的后继者，尤其是 Hörstadius（《动物学报》9 (1928)，第 1 页；《Roux' Arch.》135 (1936)，第 69-113 页）大大扩展。P. Weiss 在《发育原理》（纽约，1939 年）第 249-288 页）中对其实验进行了富有启发性的分析。Hörstadius 观察到，海胆囊胚的子午线两半发育成正常但体型较小的腹腔幼虫。虽然在这一重组过程中，“通常使用植物材料构建肠道，使用动物材料构建外胚层，但各个部分在实验胚胎中的实际用途与其在正常胚胎中的预期命运之间没有任何详细的对应关系”（同上，第 261 页）。

388 The pioneering experiments of Driesch have been greatly amplified by his successors, particularly Hörstadius (Acta Zool., 9 (1928), p. 1; Roux’ Arch., 135 (1936), pp. 69–113) whose experiments are illuminatingly analysed by P.Weiss, Principles of Development (New York, 1939), pp. 249–88. Hörstadius observed that meridional halves of the sea urchin blastula regulate into normal, though small, pluteus larvae. Though in the course of this reorganization ‘in general vegetative material was used to build the intestine and animal material to build the ectoderm, there is no detailed correspondence whatsoever between the actual use to which individual portions have been put in the experimental germ and their prospective fate in the normal germ’ (ibid., p. 261).



389由W.Roux于1888年发现（参见W.Roux，《有机体发展机制概要汇编》，莱比锡，1895年，第419-521页）。EGConklin后来进行了实验，并由Dalcq及其合作者进行了进一步扩展，结果证实了其在海鞘发育早期阶段，尤其是在处女卵中，具有相当强的调控能力（参见AMDalcq，《早期发育的形式和因果关系》，剑桥，1938年，第103-1027页）。

389 Discovered by W.Roux in 1888 (see W.Roux, Gesammelte Abhandlungen über die Entwicklungsmechanik der Organismen. II, Leipzig, 1895, pp. 419–521). Later experiments by E.G.Conklin, greatly expanded by Dalcq and collaborators, have, however, established considerable powers of regulation at early stages of the Ascidian development, particularly in the virgin egg (see A.M.Dalcq, Form and Causality in Early Development, Cambridge, 1938, pp. 103–27).



390场的概念最早由施佩曼（Spemann，1921）用于描述组织者；保罗·韦斯（Paul Weiss，1923）将其引入再生研究，并于1926年将其扩展至个体发育。参见保罗·韦斯著《发育原理》（Principles of Development），纽约，1939年，第290页。形态发生场最显著的表现是由保罗·韦斯（Paul Weiss，1956）描述的胚胎组织培养所揭示的，参见第338-339页的注释。

390 The field concept was first used by Spemann (1921), in describing the organizer; Paul Weiss (1923) introduced it for the study of regeneration and extended it (1926) to include ontogeny. Cf. Paul Weiss, Principles of Development, New York, 1939, p. 290. The most striking manifestations of morphogenetic fields were revealed by the cultivation of embryonic tissues, described by Paul Weiss (1956), see note on pp. 338– 9.



391 CHWaddington，Phil. Trans. Roy. Soc.，B，221 (1932)，179页。另请参阅CHWaddington，《鸟类表观遗传学》，剑桥，1952年，第106页及后续页。胚胎能力此前曾被O. Mangold描述为“反应性”（Reaktionsfähigkeit） ， Roux' Arch.，47 (1929)，249页。

391 C.H.Waddington, Phil. Trans. Roy. Soc., B, 221 (1932), 179. See also C.H.Waddington, The Epigenetics of Birds, Cambridge, 1952, pp. 106 ff. Embryological competence was described earlier as Reaktionsfähigkeit by O. Mangold, Roux’ Arch., 47 (1929), 249.



392P.Weiss，《发展原理》，1939年，第359页。

392 P.Weiss, Principles of Development, 1939, p. 359.



393参见 W.Roux，同上。引文，“Einleitung” zu den Beiträgen zur Entwicklungsmechanik des Embryos。（1885）。本文包含了 Entwicklungsmechanik 的第一个定义。

393 See W.Roux, op. cit., ‘Einleitung’ zu den Beiträgen zur Entwicklungsmechanik des Embryos. (1885). This paper contains the first definition of Entwicklungsmechanik.



394Paul Weiss，《生物学季刊》，25，1950 ，第 177 页。

394 Paul Weiss, Quarterly Review of Biology, 25, 1950, p. 177.



395FSCNorthrop 和 HSBurr，Growth，1，1937 ，第 78 页。

395 F.S.C.Northrop and H.S.Burr, Growth, 1, 1937, p. 78.



396CMChild，《有机体的个体性》，芝加哥，1915 年，第 183-4 页。

396 C.M.Child, Individuality in Organisms, Chicago, 1915, pp. 183–4.



397请参阅第二部分，第 6 章，第 157 页。

397 See Part Two, ch. 6, p. 157.



398Holtfreter（1951）等人近期进行的实验表明，只有活体组织才能真正发挥组织者的作用。一些胚胎学家认为，这警示我们，因果胚胎学必须继续依赖形态学知识。参见Clifford Grobstein的《生长中的合成与秩序》（Aspects of Synthesis and Order in Growth），Dorothea Rudnik编，普林斯顿，新泽西州，1954年，第233页。

398 Recent experiments by Holtfreter (1951) and others, suggesting that only living tissues act as organizers in the full sense of the term, have been taken by some embryologists as a warning that causal embryology must continue to rely on morphological knowledge. See Clifford Grobstein in Aspects of Synthesis and Order in Growth, ed. by Dorothea Rudnik, Princeton, N.J., 1954, p. 233.



399除非自然法则与操作原则存在重叠，否则只需将相关的自然法则转化为一种工具的形式，以服务于观察者认可的目的。参见第四部分，第11章，第331页和第342页。

399 Except that to the extent to which laws of nature overlap with an operational principle it suffices to transpose the natural laws in question into the form of an instrument serving a purpose acknowledged by the observer. Cf. Part Four, ch. 11, pp. 331 and 342 above.



400比较生理学表明，生物体为了同一目的（例如消化、呼吸等）会使用截然不同的机制；因此，这些机制是由其共同的运作原理而非物理和化学结构来定义的。例如，参见J.T.邦纳（J.T. Bonner）所著《细胞与社会》（伦敦，1955年），第116-121页，其中探讨了“动物的摄食”、“动物的呼吸”、“动物的循环”、“动物的排泄”、“动物的发育和繁殖”和“动物的协调”等章节。 H.Graham Cannon ( Linnean Soc.J. , 43 (1956),页) 提供了充足的证据，证明相同的操作原理——虾的过滤机制——在不同物种中是由完全不同的组成成员实现的。此外，相应的（即同源的）特性是由不同的基因在不同的突变体中产生的，而相同的基因可能产生不同的特性 (ACHardy, Proc. Psych. Res., 50 (1953), 96)。最早注意到这一事实并由 Hardy 教授提请我注意的是，GRde Beer 在《进化论》中的“胚胎学和进化”，GRde Beer 编辑，牛津，1938 年，第65-6 页。

400 Comparative physiology shows that widely different mechanisms are used by organisms for a single purpose, e.g. for digestion, breathing, etc.; such mechanisms are defined, therefore, by their common operational principle, not by their physical and chemical structure. Cf., for example, the chapters in J.T.Bonner, Cells and Societies, London, 1955, pp. 116–21, on ‘Feeding in Animals’, ‘Breathing in Animals’, ‘Circulation in Animals’, ‘Excretion in Animals’, ‘Development and Reproduction in Animals’, ‘Coordination in Animals’. H.Graham Cannon (Linnean Soc.J., 43 (1956), p. gives ample evidence that the same operational principle—the filter mechanism of shrimps—is realized in different species by quite different constituent members. Moreover, corresponding (i.e. homologous) characters are produced in different mutants by different genes and the same genes may produce different characters (A.C.Hardy, Proc. Psych. Res., 50 (1953), 96). The earliest notice of this fact, to which Professor Hardy called my attention, is by G.R.de Beer, ‘Embryology and Evolution’ in Evolution, ed. G.R.de Beer, Oxford, 1938, pp. 65–6.



401RSWoodworth 在他的《动力心理学》 （纽约，1918 年）中首次提出了这个术语，用来代替“本能”，但在心理学中并不总是以这个含义使用。

401 This term, to which R.S.Woodworth first gave currency in his Dynamic Psychology (New York, 1918), in place of ‘instinct’, is not always used in this sense in psychology.



402威廉·詹姆斯，《心理学原理》，2，伦敦，1910 年，第 93 页。

402 William James, Principles of Psychology, 2, London, 1910, p. 93.

请参阅第 323 页。

See p. 323.



403如果错误认知是可以纠正的，那么它就是一个错误；如果错误认知是强迫性的，那么它就是一个幻觉。

403 To the extent to which a false perception is corrigible it is an error; to the extent to which it is compelling, it is an illusion.



404第二部分，第 5 章，第 76 页。

404 Part Two, ch. 5, p. 76.



405当然，只有当我们假设学习实验的初始条件无限期地保持不变时，学习才对应于对自然规律进行经验推论。

405 Of course, learning corresponds to the drawing of empirical inferences concerning natural regularities only if we assume that the initial conditions of the learning experiment are maintained unchanged, indefinitely.



406这与将经验技术归类为自然科学相对应。

406 This corresponds to classing empirical technology with natural science.



407参阅第 73 页。

407 Cf. p. 73.



408Lashley，KS，《大脑机制和智力》，芝加哥，1929 年，第 133 页。

408 Lashley, K.S., Brain Mechanisms and Intelligence, Chicago, 1929, p. 133.



409NPFMaier，《挫折，无目标行为研究》，纽约、多伦多、伦敦，1949 年，第 25-76 页。

409 N.P.F.Maier, Frustration, The Study of Behavior without a Goal, New York, Toronto, London, 1949, pp. 25–76.



410I.Pavlov，《条件反射》，牛津，1927 年，第 290-1 页；另见《精选集》，莫斯科，1955 年，第 235 页及后续页（摘自Skand. Arch. Physiol.，47 （1926 年），1-14）。

410 I.Pavlov, Conditioned Reflexes, Oxford, 1927, pp. 290–1; also Selected Works, Moscow, 1955, pp. 235 f. (from Skand. Arch. Physiol., 47 (1926), 1–14).



411自1938年以来，美国和英国的心理实验室报告了大量实验性神经症病例。尽管致病情境通常被简单地描述为冲突，但尤其从NRFMaier （同上）的综合研究来看，只有动物徒劳地试图通过解决问题来逃避的冲突才是有效的。这位作者指出，当动物受到相反的冲动，而它又能清楚地预见到这些冲动时，它们可能根本不会采取任何行动。因此，“挫败感”只有在令人困惑的情境中隐藏的希望不断刺激它徒劳地试图通过智力控制来应对各种可能情况时才会产生。

411 Numerous cases of experimental neurosis were reported since 1938 from psychological laboratories in America, and some from Britain. Though the pathogenic situations are often described simply as conflicts, it appears, particularly from the comprehensive studies of N.R.F.Maier (op. cit.) that only such conflicts are effective from which the animal endeavours vainly to escape by problem solving. This author points out that, when subjected to opposite impulses which it can clearly envisage as such, the animal may simply do nothing. ‘Frustration’ develops, therefore, only when the hidden promises of a puzzling situation keep stimulating its vain efforts to gain intellectual control over the possibilities assailing him.



412CFJacobsen, Res. Publ. Ass. nerv. ment. Dis., 13 (1934), 225; 参见 JFFulton, Act, med. scand. suppl., 196 (1947), 617。

412 C.F.Jacobsen, Res. Publ. Ass. nerv. ment. Dis., 13 (1934), 225; cf. J.F.Fulton, Act, med. scand. suppl., 196 (1947), 617.



413富尔顿（同上，第621页）描述了黑猩猩在接受脑白质切除术后的行为：黑猩猩像往常一样友好地打招呼，并急切地从住处跑到转移笼，然后迅速跑到实验笼。之后，黑猩猩按照常规程序，在杯子里放诱饵，并放下不透明的挡板。然而，黑猩猩并没有表现出往常的兴奋，而是静静地跪在笼子前或四处走动。如果有机会，它会像往常一样热切而敏捷地在杯子之间做出选择。然而，每当它犯错时，它都不会表现出情绪波动，而是静静地等待杯子装好，以便下次试验。不透明的挡板再次被放下，但没有产生任何不良影响，如果它再次失败，它只是继续安静地玩耍或拨弄自己的毛发。因此，尽管这只动物反复失败，并且犯的错误比以前多得多，但它根本不可能被诊断出患有实验性神经症。就好像这只动物加入了“米歇尔长老的幸福崇拜”，并将其负担转嫁给了上帝。’

413 Fulton (op. cit., p. 621) describes the behaviour of the chimpanzee after lobotomy: The chimpanzee offered the usual friendly greeting, and eagerly ran from its living quarters to the transfer cage, and in turn went promptly to the experimental cage. The usual procedure of baiting the cup and lowering the opaque screen was followed. The chimpanzee did not, however, show its usual excitement, but rather quietly knelt before the cage or walked around. Given an opportunity, it chose between the cups with its customary eagerness and alacrity. However, whenever the animal made a mistake it showed no emotional disturbance, but quietly awaited the loading of the cup for the next trial. The opaque door was again lowered, but without untoward effect, and if the animal failed again it merely continued to play quietly or to pick over its fur. Thus, while the animal repeatedly failed and made a far greater number of errors than it had previously, it was quite impossible to evoke even a suggestion of an experimental neurosis. It was as if the animal had joined the “happiness cult of the Elder Michaeux”, and had placed its burdens on the Lord.’



414很难理解神经学家、心理学家等对目的论的惯常谴责，例如，当 WRAshby在《大脑设计》（伦敦，1952 年，第 1-10 页）中构建一个机器来解释大脑功能时，他断然放弃了所有目的论解释。

414 It is difficult to understand the customary condemnations of teleology by neurologists, psychologists, etc., for example, when W.R.Ashby, Design for A Brain, London, 1952, pp. 1–10, emphatically renounces all teleological explanations in the very act of constructing a machinery to explain the functions of the brain.



415更详细的表述请参见下文第 370 页。

415 For a more careful formulation see p. 370 below.



416以下类比或许可以说明这种情况。当一项技术可以用数学公式表达时（例如电工技术），我们称之为“应用数学”，而这种抽象技术与其实现所需的材料研究截然不同。相比之下，化学技术没有任何理论可以脱离其所依赖材料的化学性质而发展。因此，技术化学家的研究对象是某些操作原理与其成败的物质条件的融合。

416 The following parallel may illustrate this situation. We speak of ‘applied mathematics’ when a technology can be mathematically formulated (as in electro-technics), and such an abstract technology is then sharply separated from the study of the materials by which it can be implemented. By contrast, chemical technology has no theory that could be developed irrespective of the chemical properties of the materials on which it relies. Hence the technical chemist’s subject matter represents a fusion of certain operational principles with the material conditions of their success or failure.



417罗伯特·利珀（Robert Leeper，《美国心理学杂志》，65 （1952），第478页）认为赫尔在很多方面都是学习理论的领军人物。此后，控制论的兴起进一步增强了基于严格机械模型的行为主义的吸引力。ERHilgard，《学习理论》，第二版，纽约，1956年，第182页，承认赫尔“为一个真正系统化、量化的心理学体系树立了典范”。

417 Robert Leeper (Amer. Journ. Psychol., 65 (1952), p. 478) describes Hull as in many respects the major figure in learning theory. Since then the rise of Cybernetics has increased even further the attractions of a behaviourism based on a strictly mechanistic model. E.R.Hilgard, Theories of Learning, 2nd edn., New York, 1956, p. 182, acknowledges that Hull has set ‘the ideal…for a genuinely systematic and quantitative psychological system’.



418请参阅上文第 337 页。

418 See p. 337 above.



419ECTolman，《动物和人类的目的性行为》，纽约，1932 年，第 2 页。

419 E.C.Tolman, Purposive Behavior in Animals and Men, New York, 1932, p. 2.



420吉尔伯特·赖尔，《心灵的概念》，伦敦，1949 年，第 58 页：“明显的智能表现并不是心灵运作的线索；它们就是那些运作。”

420 Gilbert Ryle, The Concept of Mind, London, 1949, p. 58: ‘Overt intelligent performances are not clues to the workings of minds; they are those workings.’



421在这里使用前一章的象征意义，我们在这里从H/E（表达我自己的承诺）过渡到 .P (/HE)，通过它我承认另一个人的类似承诺（第一部分，第 3 章，第 32 页）。

421 Using here the symbolism of an earlier chapter, we are making here a transition from H/E, which utters my own commitment, to . P(/HE), by which I acknowledge another person’s similar commitment (Part One, ch. 3, p. 32).



422参见第三部分，第 9 章，第 286-288 页。

422 Cf. Part Three, ch. 9, pp. 286–8.



423参见 RAFisher 著《自然选择的遗传理论》，牛津，1930 年；J.Huxley 著《进化：现代综合》，伦敦，1942 年；GGSimpson 著《进化的主要特征》，纽约，1953 年。据称，新类型会迁移到原始类型无法进入的区域，从而被装备更优良的变种所取代，而原始类型则可以安然无恙地保留其原有的栖息地。

423 See R.A.Fisher, The Genetical Theory of Natural Selection, Oxford, 1930; J.Huxley, Evolution: The Modern Synthesis, London, 1942; G.G.Simpson, The Major Features of Evolution, New York, 1953. Replacement by better equipped variants is said frequently to take place by the migration of the new type into areas not accessible to the original type, so that the latter remains in undisturbed possession of its dwelling place.



424 (a)在整个形态发生过程中，染色体在每次连续的细胞分裂中都会被复制，从而将其自身的复制品放入最终生物体的每个细胞中。但在这些连续的细胞分裂中实现的连续分化会变得越来越特化。因此，这种渐进式分化似乎不受相关细胞中现有染色体的影响；事实上，它是由“形态发生场”决定的。(b)再生，在低等动物中可以复制整个器官，包括动物的头部，同样在形态发生场的控制下进行，同时复制一组染色体，而这些染色体在该形态发生过程中似乎不会产生任何影响。(c)特化组织在培养物中持续增殖，同时在每次细胞分裂时再次复制用于复制整个生物体的染色体组。相同染色体的复制如何产生千差万别的细胞类型？如果染色体不控制形态发生过程中产生的细胞的性质，那么是什么因素在进行这种控制呢？又怎么能说染色体控制着整体的形态发生呢？这里缺少了一些基本原理。或许，接受形态发生场作为个体发生的真正排序原理可以弥补这一缺陷。关于这一点，稍后会详述。

424 (a) Throughout the process of morphogenesis the chromosomes are reproduced at each successive cell division and thereby place a replica of themselves into every cell of the final organism. But the successive differentiations achieved in these consecutive cell divisions become ever more specialized. This progressive differentiation appears therefore unaffected by the chromosomes present in the cells in question; it is in fact determined instead by the ‘morphogenetic field’. (b) Regeneration, which in the lower animals can reproduce whole organs, including the head of the animal, proceeds likewise under control of a morphogenetic field, while duplicating a set of chromosomes which cannot be seen to exercise any effect on this morphogenetic process, (c) Specialized tissues continue to proliferate in cultures, while duplicating again at each cell division sets of chromosomes which should reproduce the whole organism. How can the duplication of the same chromosomes produce the most varied types of cells? If the chromosomes do not control the nature of the cells produced in the course of morphogenesis, what agent does exercise this control? And how can the chromosomes still be said to control morphogenesis as a whole? There is some fundamental principle missing here. Perhaps it will be supplied by accepting the morphogenetic field as the true ordering principle of ontogenesis. Of this more later.



425这可以追溯到 Reiner 和 Spiegelman 的《J. Phys. Client.》49 (1945), 81 以及 Prigogine 和 Wiame 的《Experientia》2 (1946), 451。

425 This goes back to Reiner and Spiegelman, J. Phys. Client., 49 (1945), 81 and to Prigogine and Wiame, Experientia, 2 (1946), 451.



426第一部分，第 3 章，第 39 页。

426 Part One, ch. 3, p. 39.



427赫胥黎、哈代、福特，《进化作为一个过程》，伦敦，1954 年，第 91 页。

427 Huxley, Hardy, Ford, Evolution as a. Process, London, 1954, p. 91.



428有关这一追求的生动描述，请参阅 HSJennings的《低等生物的行为》，纽约，1906 年，第 15 页，

428 For a vivid description of this pursuit see H.S.Jennings, Behavior of the Lower Organisms, New York, 1906, p. 15,



429德日进 (Teilhard de Chardin)，《人类现象》，巴黎，1955 年，第 14 页。 200.

429 Teilhard de Chardin, Le Phénomène Humain, Paris, 1955, p. 200.



430让我重申一下，与普遍的观点相反，从经典力学到量子力学的转变对这一论点没有任何影响。如果人类的粒子受量子力学方程的支配，那么他们的行为将完全由这些方程预先决定，除了某些严格无法解释的随机变化。由于人类的判断绝不是严格无法解释的随机选择，因此量子力学自动机在智能行为的表征上并不比机械自动机更好；而且它也不提供人类意识存在的可能性。

430 Let me repeat that, contrary to a widespread opinion, the change from classical mechanics to quantum mechanics makes no difference to this argument. The behaviour of human beings whose particles were ruled by the equations of quantum mechanics would be completely predetermined by these, except for a certain range of random variations which would be strictly unaccountable. Since human judgment is anything but a strictly unaccountable random choice, a quantum mechanical automaton is no better a representation of intelligent behaviour than a mechanical automaton would be; and it offers no possibility either for the presence of human consciousness.



431这里也需要对随机性进行分析，以表明随机性实际上（正如我之前在第一部分第三章第38页中所述）是概率计算适用性的最终条件，且不可进一步分析。NCCampbell在其著作《物理学：基本原理》（剑桥，1920年）中，例如在第207页中，曾着重阐述了这一观点：“我主张我们必须接受随机分布的概念，并将其作为所有关于机会和概率研究的基础；我们准备接受某些分布是随机的这一陈述，并将其作为最终陈述，且无需任何解释。所有偶然事件都可以用随机分布来解释，而当我们如此解释它们时，就无需多言了。”

431 This analysis of randomness is required here also, to show that randomness is in fact (as I have said before in Part One, ch. 3, p. 38) the ultimate, not further analysable, condition for the applicability of the calculus of probability. This view has been emphatically stated before by N.C.Campbell, Physics, The Elements, Cambridge, 1920, e.g. on p. 207: ‘I urge that we must accept the conception of a random distribution as fundamental to all the study of chance and probability; we are prepared to accept the statement that some distribution is random as an ultimate statement and as one that requires no explanation. All chance events are to be explained in terms of random distributions and when we have so explained them there is nothing more to be said.’



432例如，请参阅 IJGood，《概率和证据权重》，伦敦，1950 年，第 15 页。

432 See e.g. I.J.Good, Probability and the Weighing of Evidence, London, 1950, p. 15.



433 1设气体的整体条件（温度、压强）与n种不同的微观状态相适应，这些状态出现的概率分别为W 1 W 2 … W n，则气体的熵（S ）为 （k =玻尔兹曼常数）且S始终为一个有限的正值。我们进一步注意到，如果任何W为0或1，则相应的项不成立。现在假设我们知道气体的分子细节；那么我们就知道它处于哪种微观状态。因此，该状态的W值为1，而所有其他状态的W值为0。由此可知S =0，即其分子细节的指定已经消除了气体的熵。由于气体的温度和压力都取决于其熵，因此该结果证实了文中的说法。

433 1 Suppose the overall condition (temperature and the pressure of a gas is compatible with n different microscopic states and the probabilities of these are W1 W2…Wn. The entropy (S) of the gas is then (k=Boltzman’s constant) and S will always be a finite positive magnitude. We note further that if any W is 0 or 1 the corresponding term drops out. Suppose now that we know the molecular particulars of the gas; we know then in which microscopic state it is to be found. Consequently, the value of W for this state is 1, while W for all other states is 0. It follows that S=0, i.e. the specification of its molecular particulars has wiped out the entropy of the gas. Since both the temperature and the pressure of a gas depend on its entropy, this result corroborates the statement made in the text.



434G.Spencer Brown 认为随机化可能始终是不完整的，并试图以此为依据来解释 Rhine 的结果（G.Spencer Brown，Nature，72 （1953），第 154、594 页）。

434 G.Spencer Brown suggests that randomization might always be incomplete and tries to explain Rhine’s results on these grounds (G.Spencer Brown, Nature, 72 (1953), pp. 154, 594).



435希尔达·盖林格 (Hilda Geiringer)，《论超越数的统计研究》，载于《呈交给理查德·冯·米塞斯的数学与力学研究》，Academic Press，纽约，1954 年，第 310 页。

435 Hilda Geiringer, ‘On the Statistical Investigation of Transcendental Numbers’, in Studies in Mathematics and Mechanics presented to Richard von Mises, Academic Press, New York, 1954, p. 310.



436尼尔斯·玻尔在其法拉第讲座（《化学会志》，1932 年，第一卷，第 349 页及后续页）中表达了这样的观点：气体的宏观描述与微观描述之间的关系，是量子力学中电子位置与速度之间互补关系的一个例子。该理论支持随机性的不可指定性，但除此之外，它是不可接受的。我想在此详细阐述这一点，因为这个论点将揭示我对另一个被广泛接受的重要观点的不同意见。在量子力学中，任何试图指定电子位置和速度的尝试都必须根据电子与确定的测量仪器的相互作用来定义。结果将取决于所选的仪器，并且同样是一个概率表述。我们对粒子位置的测量定义得越狭窄，其速度的不确定范围就越大，并且两个范围的乘积是一个常数。然而，这两方面知识的互补性不同于我们对一副牌或π数字序列的两种替代性知识。因为同一副牌对一个人来说可能洗得很好，但对另一个人来说可能叠得很整齐；虽然一个人可以将π的数字作为随机序列使用，但另一个人可以非常有把握地计算出来。但电子的可能位置和速度却不是这样。在这种情况下，没有任何事物对一个观察者来说是隐藏的，而对另一个观察者来说是已知的。事实上，观察的结果并不取决于观察者的参与，而是取决于测量仪器的作用，对任何观察者来说结果都是一样的。一方面，这与原子系统的宏观和微观描述之间的关系是互补性的例子的观点相矛盾；另一方面，它还表明（与普遍的观点相反），量子力学的不确定性原理并未确立观察者对被观察对象的影响。如果我们将“测量仪器”纳入“被观察对象”之中，那么假定的影响就会消失。后者就变成了玻尔学派如今所接受的意义上的“被观察现象”。（参见L.Rosenfeld，《关于互补性的争论》（《科学进展》，第163期，1953年7月，第395页）。）

436 Niels Bohr in his Faraday Lecture (J.Chem. Soc., 1932, Pt. I, pp. 349 ff.) expressed the view that the relation between the macroscopic and microscopic description of a gas is an instance of complementarity in the sense established in quantum mechanics between the position and velocity of an electron. This theory supports the unspecifiable character of randomness, but otherwise it is not acceptable. I want to show this here in some detail, for this argument will reveal my dissent from yet another widely held opinion of great importance. In quantum mechanics any attempt at specifying the position and velocity of an electron must be defined in terms of the electron’s interaction with a definite measuring instrument. The result will depend on the instrument chosen and will again be a statement of probability. The more narrowly our measurement defines the position of a particle the more widely does it leave its velocity undetermined and the product of the two ranges is constant. The complementarity of these two ranges of knowledge differs however from the two alternative kinds of knowledge that we can have of a pack of cards, or of the sequence of digits in the number π. For the same pack of cards could be well shuffled for one man and perfectly stacked for another; and though one man can use the digits of the number π as a random sequence, another may compute them with perfect assurance. This is not so for the probable positions and velocities of an electron. There is nothing present in this case that is hidden to one observer and known to another. In fact, the outcome of the observation does not depend here on the participation of the observer, but on the action of a measuring instrument, the result being the same for any observer. This contradicts on the one hand the view that the relation between the macroscopic and microscopic descriptions of an atomistic system is an instance of complementarity; and it shows also on the other hand that (contrary to a widespread opinion) the indeterminacy principle of quantum mechanics establishes no effect of the observer on the observed object. The supposed effect vanishes if we include the ‘measuring instrument’ in the ‘observed object’. The latter becomes then ‘the observed phenomenon’ in the sense now accepted by Bohr’s school of interpretation. (See L.Rosenfeld, ‘The Strife about Complementarity’ (Science Progress, No. 163, July, 1953, p. 395).



437请参阅上文第 338n 页。

437 See p. 338n. above.



438在此，区分行动与决策或许至关重要。机械力的作用将势能转化为动能，生物场的作用可视为与此类似。但机械效应无需力，仅通过选择即可产生，例如麦克斯韦妖，它能够毫不费力地来回移动一个无摩擦、完美平衡的百叶窗，从而无限压缩气体。这提供了一种可能性，让我们设想心灵对身体的作用不施加任何力，也不转移自身的能量。事实上，由于心灵的独特功能是进行辨别，因此，心灵仅仅通过整理周围热扰动的随机脉冲就能对身体施加控制，这或许并非牵强附会。每当我们提到自主决策中心时，都应该牢记这种可能性。

438 It may be important to distinguish here between action and decision. The action of mechanical forces transforms potential into kinetic energy, and the action of biotic fields may be regarded as analogous to this. But mechanical effects can be produced without force, merely by selection, as in the case of a Maxwellian demon which can compress a gas indefinitely by effortlessly moving to and fro a frictionless, perfectly balanced shutter. This offers a possibility for conceiving the action of the mind on the body as exercising no force and transferring no energy of its own. Indeed, since it is the peculiar function of the mind to exercise discrimination, it may not even appear too far- fetched that the mind should exercise power over the body merely by sorting out the random impulses of the ambient thermal agitation. We may bear this possibility in mind whenever referring to autonomous centres of decision.



439从这个意义上讲，认为获取知识的能力源于其所提供的选择优势的说法似乎是同义反复的；显然，你不能用生物的生存来解释生命的起源。诚然，认知能力或许可以通过其选择优势得到进一步发展；但由于这并不能解释其运作方式，因此也不能说它解释了其起源。

439 To this extent the suggestion that the faculty of acquiring knowledge originated in the selective advantage offered by it appears tautologous; you obviously cannot explain the origin of life by the survival of living beings. Admittedly, the cognitive faculty may be developed further by its selective advantage; but since this does not explain how it works, neither can it be said to explain its origin.
